name: Desert Mystery
description: A hardcore tactical shooter, where your main mission is to eliminate any threat blocking your way and escape the enemy lines

name: Streets of Rogue: Character Pack
description: Complete your collection of playable characters with these six new classes!

name: Reimu's Weird little adventure
description: A classic 2D RPG Touhou fan game with some bullet hell element and a silly story. Reimu was bored, like, really bored, so she went and beat Cirno up! with a twist, and another twist! actually there are quite some twists. Oh, also, this game is filled with crappy jokes that no one will understand.

name: Choco Pixel D
description: Choco Pixel D is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: NobleEscape
description: NobleEscape is the ultimate story based, puzzle, escape room game out there. You start the game with one end goal; Escape the room to save your life! Not only will you need to escape the room, but you need to avoid multiple obstacles along the way.

name: Connected Towers
description: Connected Towers is a puzzle game where you play as a robot that needs to connect towers to activate fences, platforms, and much more.

name: Lilulu
description: Lilulu is an exploration puzzle game, the theme of the game is to explore the mental state of a character Lilulu with an unusual mental state.

name: Chandrayaan VR
description: A real-time experience of Mission Chandrayaan and an explorative journey through space and time unfolding the story and milestones of the mission.

name: Lily of the Hollow: Resurrection
description: What is going to be acted before you is——Blossom in the shackles, but deep down in your bone, suspension and romantic.

name: Puzzle Plowing A Field
description: Solve the puzzle in 50 extra levels. The goal of the game is easy. Go through all the areas without leaving any and without going through it twice.

name: Virus: The Outbreak
description: In Virus: The Outbreak we allow the players to face the most current and touching topic of all - a pandemic of a dangerous virus. As the leader of the Global Health Organization (GHO) your task is to contain the spread of a virus and save humanity before it is too late. In addition to crisis management, the game provides the players with information on how to behave in the event of an epidemic, what actions to take, and how to protect themselves and their loved ones in the most effective way. The game is based on the data published by WHO and on the information acquired from experts and consultants. Through your actions, you will be able to see how difficult it is to manage during a crisis, what impact various decisions can have on an effective fight against a global epidemic, which can be caused by listening to charlatans or the lack of appropriate medical equipment.

name: Harold's Walk
description: Explore 3D worlds and discover all the secret objects in Harold's Walk. Master the use of your special abilities to reach new areas.

name: Farming Simulator 19: Alpine Farming
description: Enrich your Farming Simulator 19 experience and reach for the mountaintop with the official Alpine Farming Expansion for Farming Simulator 19!

name: The Dream of Shadowlands
description: The first episode of an indie horror RPG series with hand-drawn visuals inspired by 90s anime.

name: Scoot
description: Scoot is a physics based scooter game made for all the scooter riders out there! Perform tricks, airs, flips, and make parks to share with your friends!

name: Burn the Witch
description:
Burn The Witch is Multiplayer title which puts you in the role of either a Witch or a Peasant.
As a Peasant you must work to discover who within your village is a Witch and eliminate them.
As a Witch you have access to a variety of spells and map interactions to make use of to eliminate all Peasants form your village.

name: Kokoro Clover Part2
description: The second installment in the "Sunday morning anime" x "casual difficulty side-scrolling" anime game series "Kokoro Clover"! Five new scenarios with new characters and new stages have been added. This series can be enjoyed by children and those who are not good at action.

name: The Series Finale of Supernatural
description: I have never seen this show. I can only explain why I made this by saying that I said I was going to, and then I never looked back.

name: Priest
description: Priest is a combination of Christian mythology with dark fantasy. We based it upon real testimonies concerning exorcism as well as general works of pop culture, i.e. novels, films and series. Black metal and Polish folklore also inspired us, so there will be a number of relevant references”.

name: Hamburgers En Route to Switzerland
description: Sin descripción

name: Silent Infinity
description: Silent Infinity is a English Yume Nikki fangame. The fangame is unique in having a dominant ocean theme. You play as Umitsuki and explore her dream world, the goal of the game being to find effects. Along with saving, the player can change the computer's wallpaper or play a minigame.

name: Unboxing the mind of a Cryptic Killer
description:
Two detectives get trapped as the next targets of a Cryptic Killer. Being separated they have to solve the puzzles that the killer prepared for them. Neither of them has the full picture, so they have to communicate in order to escape.

The game is co-op only, played on two devices with an external voice connection.

name: Devil Express: Soulstice
description: festive fan service.

name: Color Cube
description: In this puzzle game, your goal is to turn grey cubes into the color of the cube you control. The game is simple and relaxing.

name: ACT
description: Bluff, build alliances, betray your friends, and become the richest player! Speak with other players, guess their job, and kill them if it can bring you money. Between Police, FBI, Robber, Mafia, Kamikaze, and Serial Killer, you will find the best job to win.

name: Path of Memory
description: Path of Memory is a puzzle game where you test your memory, relax and listen to calm musics. Complete the sequence in the right order to uncover the hidden stars in 60 different levels.

name: Train Sim World 2: LGV Méditerranée: Marseille - Avignon Route Add-On
description: Experience the excitement of high-speed rail, aboard the iconic TGV Duplex, through sun-soaked Southern France with Train Sim World 2: LGV Méditerranée.

name: Cosmic Disco
description: Feel the beat! A VR rhythm shooter where you kill enemies in beat, as they fly towards you, alternating pistols hand to hand, surrounded by beautiful skies with musical visualization. Created by a solo developer.

name: Belling Coins
description: Classic maze puzzle mechanics in a new game! Beautiful graphics and interesting gameplay are waiting for you in "Belling Coins".

name: Comic Coloring Book
description: The coloring books have always been enjoyed by children, in the meantime, developing their motor skills and awareness of colors and shapes. They have also taught the persistence necessary to complete a page or a whole book. Comic Coloring Book brings this great and useful experience to Nintendo Switch. Heroes you will like In this coloring book, we follow the adventures of siblings who found unusual toys during one of their games: a robot and an alpacorn. Together they’ll experience unforgettable moments, both in the comfort of their own home and among fantastic landscapes such as the cosmos and the land of sweets. Engaging stories The coloring book is filled with surprising stories, and each of them consists of 4 unique drawings. Thanks to this, children not only have fun coloring but also discover new adventures and learn about friendship, joy sharing, and helping each other. Beautiful graphics The drawings were created by an artist with many years of experience in making illustrations for children. Energetic characters, friendly style, and creative landscapes will make everyone smile. 3 free stories You can already discover how it all started, play in space with the robot or check how the princess from the faraway kingdom and her favorite alpacorn are spending their free time. Just open the coloring book! Ideal for the creative ones Coloring books help children express their feelings and develop their creativity. To best support them in this, the Comic Coloring Book includes many coloring tools—from crayons to comic book stickers. You can also unlock the…

name: Hell Sports
description: 3 min to win. Aim for the top league in Hell! Simple rules! While protecting your sinners and tank, score goals! Prevent opponent's goals by using Hell Sports various skills! 2 on 2 battle in 3 min! Co-play with your friends or play by yourself! 10 unique characters available!

name: Veinless Property
description:
Veinless Property is a cell shaded horror game based on a home invasion in the style of Junji Ito. 
 
This Game is one of 3 Games made in a 3 week long GameJam by Triality Games.

name: Freaky Clown: Town Mystery
description: Can you solve the evil mystery of this town and face the freaky clown and his horrors alone? Take on this horror adventure and play and discover the evil plans of the clown.

name: Captain Pegleg
description: Captain Pegleg is a 2.5D platformer that includes 20+ challenging levels. Every level can be played with focus on different goals. Find all hidden treasure chests, collect all gems, time attack or get through without dying. Special moves like using a parachute or matrix like time modification move need to be used to reach the challenges. Try a local multiplayer mode using split screen. Compete with each other and try to reach the finish line before your opponent does, but don’t forget to collect items on your way to win the challenge.

name: The Button Witch
description: Adventure game full of magic, puzzles and cute characters, featuring a young witch-in-training and a talking ghost-squirrel!

name: Pax Solis
description: Pax Solis is a mod for Europa Universalis IV which adds more content to the 1444 start date, especially East Asian content which is relatively neglected by the main game. The map and UI are also changed to an extent.

name: Hentai it's my life
description: Hentai it's my life is a casual puzzle game, you need to move parts of the image to restore the drawing.

name: Undertale: No More Deals
description: A fanmade continuation of the Undertale genocide route, featuring a boss battle against Chara.

name: Super Mario: The Trip
description: In a romhack for SMW with 10 worlds, Mario goes on a journey in an unknown world.

name: Silent Hill Metamorphoses
description: The main character of the game, Eve Coulman, goes to Silent Hill looking for her missing brother. Arriving at the place, the girl is surprised at the snowfall in early May, and having met several bizarre characters on her way, she realizes that something strange is happening to the town.

name: A Day in the Life of a Writer
description: A small interactive fiction about the day of a writer, their routine, their work, their fears, and anxieties...

name: Wakdoo Random Defence
description:
Fan games of "woowakgood"
Year-end contest entries for the year 2020

name: 100% Orange Juice: Chris & Kyupita
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Chris and Kyupita, as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: Beat the Moles
description: Beat The Moles is an arcade game where you have to hammer at the moles that hide and sometimes crawl out of their holes.

name: Kittens of Fear
description: Kittens of Fear is a fast-paced, first-person horror game. 100% jump-scare free.

name: Akashicverse: Pandemonic Nightmare
description: "Akashicverse: Pandemonic Nightmare" is an additional DLC. Challenge yourself with the new extra stage of high difficulty.

name: The Iron Hand in the Velvet Glove
description: So, Agent! Are you a bad enough Trusted Internet Investigator to conduct a "Knock-and-Talk" with ███████ (henceforth known as "The Subject")?

name: Ariborne: Trials
description: Airborne is a game with a series of trials that get progressively harder. The trials contain parkour and puzzles that you must surpass. In these trials you will encounter many platforms that can be friend or foe, or there just kind of there and don't do anything but that usually doesn't happen.

name: Never Stop Never Stopping
description: Never Stop Never Stopping is a Boom Compatible level where the idea is to keep moving at all time. It's a relatively short adrenaline rush designed to keep you on your feet. It also uses @Tango's excellent minicharge mod as a base.

name: PUFIWEHO
description: Protecting Us From Incredibly Worrisome Extremely Hostile Oddities...is what you will be doing with your football! Defend the Earth from the invading disciples of the Deranged Octopus, and learn the ultimate secret of the Universe.

name: M-PS2Craft
description: M-PS2Craft is an unofficial version of Minecraft for the PlayStation 2.

name: Carrion: Greatest Time of Year
description: In honor of the December holidays developers Phogia Game Studio released a special holiday update for the monster game Carrion called the Greatest Time of the Year. This update is free for players and features a brand new level for players to complete in-game. This DLC level tasks players with taking the monster through a base that has been decorated for the holidays.

name: High School Girls Detective: Escape from the Murder Time Loop
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Clean Half-Life
description: Actions take place during half-life 1. We play as a scientist in HEV and try to get out of the black mesa. Passing through the trials of a terrible catastrophe, you gradually solve a terrible riddle. Can you get to the key that will open the scary curtain of secrecy?

name: 96: Another Story
description: This is a short spin-off that takes place 6-7 years before the events of the main game and dwells on what could have been.

name: Sakura-iro Dreamer
description: Sakura-iro Dreamer is a short heartwarming coming-of-age visual novel featuring hololive member Sakura Miko.

name: Do not Donut.
description: Sin descripción

name: Linearity
description: Linearity is a companion puzzle game: create lines, as many and as complex as you can. Just turn the blocks to make them connect until you have a line without any breaks.

name: Mountaineer
description: A game about mountains, resource management, and helping people.

name: Russiaphobia
description: Immerse yourself in the Russian Realities as Foreign Agents and help the Presidents Make Russia Great Again! Cooperative Multiplayer, World Government, Evil Russians and more! Russia is Waiting for You!

name: Cat Stories: New Year
description: A small interactive hidden objects game about a cat who slept through everything and now has to prepare for the New Year in the shortest possible time while the owner is not at home. Puzzles, mini-games and a festive mood await you.

name: Don't Crash: The Zombie Game
description: WARNING THIS GAME CRASHES WHEN YOU DIE! IT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME! Game features "endless" Zombie and Soldier combat, several levels As well as a shotgun, pistols, assault rifles, RPG Launcher and a knife. This is a work in progress game.

name: Pretty Girls and Dark Witch. A simple story
description: Five brave sorceresses go to the Witch's castle to rescue the Princess. But the monsters in the castle will do everything to stop them!

name: Covert Commando
description: A no frills rogue ultra-lite top down dual stick looter shooter.

name: Fast Cubes
description: Fast Cubes is a puzzle game with time limits. Your objective is to place the cubes in their respective slots. Pass through portals, avoid spikes and find keys to achieve your objective. You'll need to think and to act to win this game.

name: Banjo-Kazooie and the NightBear Before Christmas
description: Banjo-Kazooie and the NightBear Before Christmas is a ROM hack/mod of Banjo-Kazooie (Nintendo 64), as a parody for Tim Burton's Nightmare Before Christmas movie.

name: Brave Hero
description: BRAVE HERO is a platformer where the player faces a seemingly simple task to collect all the shards of the crystal.

name: Naudrion: Fall of The Empire
description: Dark fantasy RPG with open world. Together with Markus, you can experience an unforgettable journey, any of your actions may have consequences.

name: Tombo Survivor
description: The government of the evil pig and its Tombos have taken over Polombia

name: Trajectory Fracture
description: A fully physics based game featuring challenges that revolve around breaking items in satisfying ways and letting off some steam doing it

name: Life of A Yandere Simp
description: Life of a Yandere Simp is a simulation game inside a university where you, a simp, have to find out who is interested in your love interest and eliminate them.

name: Aggressive Robot Vacuum
description: Aggressive Robot Vacuum-a robot vacuum cleaner simulator with a top view, where your task is to clean up the mess in one minute! Beware of hard and sharp objects, because they can cause the robot to explode! Collect coins to improve cleaning performance and most importantly-clean up the trash!

name: Masters of Puzzle: Christmas Edition - Mystery Town
description: A special edition puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Save Christmas
description: You and Santa Claus flew to distribute gifts to children. Passing one of the forests, Santa Claus lost control and crashed into a tree, all the gifts scattered through the forest with zombies.

name: Mummmaster!
description: Protect the tomb of the pharaoh from plunderers! Craft mummies, gut corpses, collect resources, create stronger monsters every time. And most importantly, do not let the cat steal!

name: Aibeya 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Map Game: Or Something
description: An action platformer game that involves drawing maps and playing through cool and epic levels with really cool and awesome and creative design.

name: Isekai: Reincarnation in a New World
description: Isekai: Reincarnation in a New World is an RPG game where the player takes on the role of an animal and must survive in a classic fantasy world while trying to find out what happened in their past.

name: Revenge on the Streets 2
description: In this game you will play with (Saul) who had his sister kidnapped by a crime boss, (Saul) proposes to save her and will make his revenge on the streets.

name: Vaccine19
description: 100% Free 'Hip-Fire' Arcade Shooter! Instead of using crosshairs or sights on gun, Vaccine19 has the player visualize shot trajectory. Don't Get Infected!

name: Ayu: The Dream Soul
description: Ayu: The Dream Soul is a surreal horror adventure experience where you control Ayu, a girl who suddenly finds herself in bizarre logic-less worlds. Now she has to find out the reason as to why she's in this place.

name: Happy New Year, Zeliria!
description: This is a New Year's fairy tale and at the same time a small spin-off of the first part of the game Zeliria Sactuary.

name: Magic Emperor 1
description: The Magic emperor is a heroine is a female emperor love word game, lazy play, rich plot of interactive visual novel game. Can guide the male leading role for five, exclusive custom set up painting, to bring you a beautiful love story visual feast.The game has had 400,000 hits and 20,000 player retweets and favorites, now it's on steam!!

name: Dungeonoid
description: Your mission is to cross the dungeons of the Infernal Castle with the aim of recovering the 3 sacred gems and defeating the Demon Master and his henchmen. Are you ready?

name: Candy 2048 Challenge
description: Candy 2048 Challenge brings back the iconic 2048 game with a new multiplayer function. It takes the intense fun of the original 2048 and pits you against one other friend, to really see who is the best! Test your intelligence in this infinite puzzle game, featuring a split-screen multiplayer mode for a 1 vs. 1 challenge, fun and addictive music, and a local leaderboard.

name: Object N
description: A classic dynamic shooter which takes place in a science underground center.

name: Mutant Ops
description: Mutant Ops is a low poly co-op shooter. Go in alone or with friends and survive endless waves of mutants and monsters.

name: White Feathers
description: brio, oh brio you know, the forest is crumbling

name: Beetle Bunt
description: Beetle Bunt is a puzzle game about a beetle that likes to flip objects over. Help Herc the beetle shove tablets under the light, revealing inscriptions on the other side. Beat challenging block rotation and block position puzzles while testing your platforming skills.

name: Winterwood
description: This is a short but sweet game about trekking through the woods to make a special delivery.

name: Space Loner Chronicle
description: Sea Green is totally alone in space, and she like, loves it, of course!

name: Wilds
description: bitsy secret santa gift (cosy / chill / space)

name: Pocket Watch
description: A time-traveling adventure game on a tropical island.

name: Stop the War
description:
Stop the War is a hardcore tactical first person shooter, and your main mission is to eliminate every enemy blocking your way as you advance deeper into enemy lines.

The year is 2020, you're stuck in the rural part of South Sudan and you're one of the few survivors defending peace to this day. Keeping it that way will be a challenge. You can either go in guns blazing or play it stealthy, that will be up to your own liking. Stop The War by eliminating all the terrorists and bring peace to our region! Good luck soldier, you will need it, believe me, this ain't no simple task.

name: The Shell Part III: Paradiso
description: The coiling chains of obsession that began with The Shell now threaten to strangle Detective Reiji Tokisaka in the third and final entry in the trilogy. As old friends and foes rise up for one last confrontation, can anyone break the cycle—and can Reiji's heart ever be set free?

name: Love, Elections and Chocolate
description: An upscaled version of Love, Election & Chocolate, now in 16:9, with resolutions up to 4K and localized to English and Simplified/Traditional Chinese.

name: Cyberless III: Online
description: Multiplayer FPS battle game set in the virtual world in the future.

name: Cryptic
description: Kidnapped by an insane man and dragged into a dark crypt, your only choice is to play along with his twisted games or suffer the consequences for non-compliance.

name: Omori
description: A turn-based surreal horror RPG in which a child traverses various mundane, quirky, humourous, mysterious and horrific lands with his friends in search of a missing person while confronting his past and his fears. Explore a strange world full of colorful friends and foes. When the time comes, the path you’ve chosen will determine your fate... and perhaps the fate of others as well.

name: 360 Five Nights at Freddy's
description: 360FNAF is an accurate FNaF 1 Custom Night remade with modern technology. Play on your desktop in flat mode or in VR!

name: Santa's Outback Bender
description:
It’s almost Christmas Eve, but no one’s seen Santa since he left to go party with demons in Australia! Those dudes are such bad influences... hell, they've practically got the whole country on lockdown. You hate being a buzzkill, but if someone doesn't find Santa and sober the old bastard up, no one's getting any prezzies!

Santa's Outback Bender is a Doom 2 limit-removing project from various members of Doomer Boards, led by resident down under Doomer glenzinho. It's the 3rd annual Doomer Boards Project Christmas extravaganza, and this year instead of the traditional cooler climes of the northern Winter, we're heading south to enjoy a Summer Christmas Down Under style. That means there's no snow and plenty of sun, surf, sand, and slaying!

name: Haunted House
description: A super short visual novel about exploring a haunted house.

name: G-Mode Archives 26: Ore no Sentai Oranger
description:
I'll make the next hero!
Become the commander of the Hero Squadron and protect the peace on Sunday morning!

"Ore no Sentai Oranger" is a training simulation game that nurtures the hero squadron.

Each of the five members of the squadron has their own personality, age and gender.
In addition to normal physical techniques, I will master "special moves" that make use of my specialty, such as a ike-face attack that shoots the hearts of moms.

The growth of the Oranger was confirmed by the battle with the enemy in the Sunday morning program and sales (children's festival).

Cultivate a squadron according to the fan base, and compete with other heroes for the popularity ranking and aim for the first place.
It's up to you how you enjoy it. Let's grow your favorite squadron!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 3
description: Special Music Pack, Vol. 3 is a special Music pack including arrangements of the 6 most requested Music, plus 6 challenges to go with each Music!!

name: Ace Defender
description:
Ace Defender is a unique game with both tower defense gameplay elements and, more frequently, turn based SRPG elements. The game focuses on casual play with both passive and active gains each day. Collect and develop heroes, pets, and many other methods of progression and power. Interesting gear system. This is a feature rich, easy and casual, game. Nonetheless, players must build their heroes and teams carefully to succeed.

This is an original and entertaining game with a magic world where every player can become a great hero. Choose your favorite warriors and fight for your faction by completing expeditionary battles, advance through the levels of the Trials Tower.
Play with your friends and form an alliance to apply your combined wits, strategy and tactics to become the most powerful alliance in the land.

name: Cold Call
description: On Christmas Eve, Officer Frederick Hartwell believes he's on a routine call-out to settle a domestic dispute but gets more than he bargained for when he finds that the house is empty, it's unnaturally cold and something seems to be lurking in the darkness.

name: 像素男友 语音完整版
description: Sin descripción

name: LineVox
description: LineVox is a casual cyberpunk game suitable for both one and several players, where you have to control the ship avoiding obstacles in order to win.

name: Angel Sex Pet
description: An innocent angel comes to Earth but runs out of energy before she can make the return trip home. Turns out a human's "love" is what Charlotte gets her energy from. Being a pent-up single guy living on their own, Takeshi has A LOT of love he can pump her full of!

name: Yolo Space Hacker
description: Welcome to our ethical hacker's organisation: we will teach you how to use actual hacker tools (terminal, proxy, reverse shells...) to scan the network, crack passwords, bypass server security and solve the mystery of the Bikini-72 space station.

name: I Want to Fly
description: This is the story of Evie Maine, a shy girl with a difficult past. Evie is just starting her first year of university away from home. At first she's worried about fitting in, but once she sees a glider flying high above, her priorities quickly change. My name is Evie, and I want to fly.

name: PetDrivr
description: Drive with your pet over the town, collecting pet snacks, and their favorite toys before reaching your destination. Get help from your friends to find the exact location of the toy in the cooperative mode, or challenge them to find out who can collect more snacks!

name: Petals of the Star Curtain
description: Sin descripción

name: Lotharus: Bacon, Ale & Repeat
description: A humorous RPG/Adventure in full 2D, filled with quirky characters, nasty dungeons, and lots of exploration!

name: Ursa
description: Explore Ursa as you help activate positional beacons on the surface of the planet. Look for collectibles along the way! Compete on the leaderboards for the best times!

name: Omega Blade
description: Shoot, slash, dodge and survive to blade combats in multiple kind of challenges to test your skills and claim your place in the Omega Blade hall of fame.

name: Hell Loop
description: Hell Loop is a platformer tower defense where your goal is to kill sinners trying to escape from hell. Place automated traps and enjoy the bloodbath. It's like Lemmings, but your goal is to kill them all.

name: Stan Lee's Verticus
description: You are Verticus, a superhero equipped with a high tech, heat-resistant jump suit who must prevent the Earth’s destruction at the hands of an evil alien race known as The Obliterators!

name: JDM Racing 2
description: Drive legendary Japanese cars on various tracks. Beat records, take part in different racing events, rise from Beginner to Pro League driver. Collect, win, tune up, and upgrade your dream cars.

name: Super Puzzles Dream: Xmas
description: Puzzles move onto the next level with ‘Super Puzzle Dream’, a mix between classic jigsaw and a ‘Tetris’-style dynamic mechanic. Become an expert and finish the puzzles in the shortest possible time and you will find yourself amongst the best in the world on the online leaderboard. Have fun working together to complete the puzzles in co-op mode. You can also play with friends and family in the one-on-one split-screen competition mode. Your rival won't make it easy for you! Don't give up! Fill an energy bar to perform a counterattack and put them in their place.

name: Candy Jump featuring Frosty
description: Direct Frosty the jumping snowman through unlimited frozen candyland puzzles as he climbs higher and you reach high scores! Use your snowflake coins to buy design your own snowman or get new frosty friends. Play as Mrs. Frosty, Santa Snowman and Reindeer Snowman! Endless levels plus additional snowman characters make this a never-ending puzzle to jump your way through. Just keep your eyes on the sky for angry candy monsters. Children, as well as adults, will enjoy this simple, yet challenging jump game. Make winter snow and snowmen a year round frozen experience for your family.

name: Arcade Archives: Gradius III
description: Gradius III is a scrolling shooter game released by Konami in 1989. The story of Planet Gradius has transformed from legend to myth. Take on the Bacterion Empire in epic space battles. An edit mode has been added to the game, allowing players to customize their equipment. Enjoy playing the best game in the series!

name: Dentures and Demons 2
description:
"Weird things happen in Varedze..." ...But not as weird as what is happening in your city.

Come on, why are you still reading this stuff? Hit download and enjoy the adventure!

name: GG Aleste 3
description: GG Aleste 3 is a sequel for the Aleste series and a direct followup to GG Aleste II, released in December 2020 as a special bonus included on the Aleste Collection for the Sony PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch and as part of the limited edition Game Gear Micro included with the premium edition of the collection. The game was developed as a true Game Gear game, not being a simple recreation of the system's technical aspects.

name: Super Sports Blast
description: Volley, Tennis or Soccer - choose your favorite sport, take to the field and prepare to have a blast!!

name: Wilderness
description: Survive in the wild nature by playing as an animal or as a human. Play as an animal and survive by your own or build a herb to stay protected. Have babies and protect them from predators. Play as a human and craft items, build a house, customize your character and more.

name: Aleste Collection
description:
Aleste Collection is a compilation featuring the Sega Master System and Game Gear Aleste titles as well as a entirely new title, released in December 2020 for the PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch.

The physical edition of the game includes a booklet with interviews and official art, while the limited premium edition also includes a 32 pages booklet with production notes and concepts and a exclusive Game Gear Micro set with all games in the compilation.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers
description: Unlike the original "EDF" series, which are drawn in a photo-realistic world, this game is boldly drawn in a voxel world! For people who just hate the look of huge real insects, or who are not so good at some brutal in-game expressions, this game can be your first EDF experience which you can exhilaratinglly defeat gigantic enemies.

name: Akita Oga Mystery Annai: Kogoeru Ginreika
description: The second retro-style travel mystery adventure! This game is a suspense command ADV set in Akita's Oga region in Japan.The character designer is a manga artist Kiyokazu Arai, following his previous work "Iseshima Mystery Annai".

name: Think_
description: A normal rhythm-combat RPG in which nobody can die.Maybe.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Geno Hat + Outfit
description: A Mii Fighter costume of Geno from Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars is now available. The outfit part is for Mii Gunners only. Geno descended from above to repair the Star Road. Leap into battle with his billowing blue cape to really Smash out in style!

name: 3x3
description: 3x3 is a 29-level megawad that came to life as a community project hosted by MFG38. Participating mappers were given a week to make up to 2 maps each while only allowed to use 3 flats, 3 textures and 3 enemy types. (A select few textures/flats were excluded from the limit.)

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Erotica Christmas
description: A nice 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring Christmas themed soft erotica line drawings hand drawn by LineArtBabe, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: What the Golf? It's Snowtime
description: Complete with snowpals, moose, cars, ice cubes and pizza of course. We even added snow to make it look like golf.

name: Genshin Impact: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon
description:
Version 1.2 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Albedo and Ganyu
• New area: Dragonspine
• New story quests for Albedo and Ganyu
• New main event: The Chalk Prince and the Dragon
• …and more!

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Anniversary Edition
description:
For 6 years, Photo-Negative Mickey and his friends have terrified audiences across the internet. For one last time, you can experience that terror.

On December 1, 2014, Anart1996 would announce his FNaF fangame... "Five Nights at Treasure Island."

FNaTI would go on to pioneer the fangame scene and change the way we see Mickey Mouse and the Disney Corporation.

For the game's (late) birthday, the Radiance Team has decided to release a special version of FNaTI to commemorate the game. Enjoy.

name: Adonis
description:
Adonis, a story about love and death...

Incarnate Adonis, the spirit of a familiar who was separated from his witch when they died. He will then try to save the soul of his former mistress by going to appease her, suffering from an endless mourning...

name: A Floof's Adventure
description: The giant currant tree has been giving fewer fruits over time, your duty is to, at least, bring back some edible currants to your village...

name: Back Home for Christmas
description: A cute and cozy adventure game about a lost penguin who can't find their way home for Christmas. Along the way, the penguin meets a cast of charming characters that provide help.

name: Warring States
description: An online social game about war, teamwork, and deception for 2-4 players.

name: Phoenix Squadron
description: Take flight in the year 2074 after a devastating war that sent the planet into chaos, Leaving a blind eye to a large asteroid approaching the planet, After a ceasefire was called all parties involved in the conflict built 7 giant towers/nodes that can form a defensive shield and fire a giant laser, However... all the towers went offline just a few hours ago...

name: All in! Bundle
description: The All in! Bundle is like a box of chocolates—full of bugs, tools, planes… Um, wait a minute—we mean full of adventure and fun! Renovate together in Tools Up!, conquer the skies in Red Wings: Aces of the Sky, and visit the surreal world of insects in Metamorphosis.

name: InfiniWordSlide
description: Inspired by the *tris family of games as well as the word search of the world, InfiniWordSlide gives you a score attack that will test your knowledge of the language, your ability to quickly react and reward good strategy. The controls are simple and the mechanics clear.

name: Dark Fantasy Warriors
description: Dark Fantasy Warrior is a third-person action role-playing game in Dark Souls style. Extremely dark, deep and DIFFICULT! All of that in this super action game and prepare to die. Are you ready to fight Darkness?

name: TenebriS
description: Tenebris is a hardcore platformer in which you play as a skull trying to get out of a dark dungeon

name: Elrit Clover: A Forest in the Rut is Full of Dangers
description: 2.5D puzzle action. You can customize a heroine, and aim for Imperial Knights' Garrison to seek help. If the heroine is got by bad guys, she got sexual play.

name: Leaper
description: Leaper is a pixel arcade side-scrolling platformer.

name: Understanding, the Game
description: 'Understanding, the game' it's a suspense/investigation horror indie game inspired in classic horror games! Full Game coming as soon we can! Help us grow the game!

name: Eye, caramba!
description: Got a keen eye? Then try to solve these colorful soothing puzzles while listening to relaxing music!

name: Thyra Adventure
description: Thyra Adventure is a game based on medieval history. Become a warrior and save the middle earth from Zarod's hands, going through traps, facing warriors and magicians along the way.

name: Welcome to Emba
description: Matthew goes to meet his beloved, who was forced to land on the old base. But there is a catch - he is on a distant planet, where during the breeding phases of the local fauna people see hallucinations.

name: Battlemetal
description: Battlemetal is a successor to the 90's mech simulators of old. A delightful modernization of commanding giant robots bristling with firepower. Players choose and customize their war machines known as METALS, and then drop into the blighted world of Geiserath.

name: Hexxagon - Board Game
description: The object of the game is to make your pieces constitute a majority of the pieces on the board at the end of the game, by converting as many of your opponent's pieces as possible. You can play against a friend or alone in arcade mode with increasing difficulty. The game will test you tactic skills and entertain you and your friends. Dominate the board and climb the leaderboard. Based on an early 90's arcade game.

name: 16-Bit Soccer
description:
Do you love those soccer games on consoles & home computers from the 90s?

If you want to relive those moments of fast-paced action with cool pixel graphics then "16-Bit Soccer" is just what you're looking for!

You'll get a real buzz playing this game which is easy to learn but hard to master and even more difficult to put down!!!

name: Go! Birdie
description: Being a little nestling, Birdie listened to the story about a Golden Grain many times. Growing up he dreamed of finding the treasure, however, he didn’t have enough strength and determination. Now, when he is grown up, he decided to fulfill his childhood dream and find this artifact. Join our hero, to experience a wonderfull adventure in various and colorful locations. Starting in a modest forest, throughout rich castles, down to the secrets of the deep sea. Help Birdie defeat the threats he might encounter, and with help of other travelers lead him to the Golden Grain. In "Go! Birdie", you have to collect all fruits present in grid-based, maze-like levels. Other animals will try to stop you, so avoid conflicts or pick up right power-ups to fight back. There are also bonus levels, where time is your only enemy. You can either maximize your score by beating whole game at once, or play it cool from chapter to chapter.

name: Be Hunted
description: Be Hunted is a special co-op horror game, that combines ghost hunting, escape game, psychological horror, paranormal activity, and more. You can play alone, or up to 4 player for the basic gameplay mode. You will use your ghost hunting equipment to prepare yourself.

name: Tomb Raider Reloaded
description: Tomb Raider Reloaded is a free-to-play arcade shooter developed by Emerald City Games and published by CDE Entertainment. It's based on the original CORE Design Tomb Raider games from the late 1990s, recreated in a new colorful art style and presented with a top-down perspective.

name: Magic Castle
description: Magic Castle was a PlayStation game developed with Net Yaroze. Production started in 1997 and the project was cancelled in 1998, Development was resumed in 2020 and while still not complete, the game is fully playable. At this point, the only missing features are the four player support and Japanese translation.

name: Pizz.Uno
description:
Pizz.Uno (or Pizzuno) is a free multiplayer card game inspired by UNO.

Players take turns to match the card in their hands with the last card played, matching it either by color, number, or action.
Action cards can help you defeat your opponents or bring you a game-changing moment.
The last player to shed all their cards win.

You can play either Singleplayer mode (Against Bots/CPUs/AIs) or Multiplayer (Against other humans you invite).

name: Fortification: tower defence
description: Coop or single player tower defence on procedurally generated maps.

name: Sayonara Electric
description: This is an Interactive Adventure and Visual Novel Game depicting life on a lunar base. All texts are performed by Japanese Voice Actors. On a wall-mounted electronic calendar"IMPORTANT!" is flickering. (what's my plan today?) "Today is Christmas Eve." The date shown on the calendar is

name: Ortharion Project
description: Come discover the world of Ortharion! Improve your character by killing your opponents or discovering many secrets. To finally take control of the region!

name: Stay in the Light
description: Stay in the Light is an immersive first person horror game with a combination of unique features: Real-time Ray Tracing and random dungeon generator.

name: They Are Hundreds
description: They Are hundreds is a sandbox first-person survival. Build great walls, fight great hordes of varying types, or just have a goof with friends in multiplayer.

name: AlterVerse: Disruption
description:
Disruption is the first of several planned games in the AlterVerse. You’ll start your adventure aboard a massive Disrupter starship exploring the Solone solar system, raiding and looting as you go. Your Objective is to climb the Ranks by earning XP!

5 Games in 1 plus Tournaments
Starship Raider: Make your fortune looting Ship’s treasure chests!
Alliance Wars: Lead your Alliance to glory in Capture the Flag action!
Free-For-All Brawl: A Deathmatch style Launchbay Fighting Frenzy!
Altercation: Challenge other players to PVP battles, Race the XR75s!
Hero’s Quest: Find the keys and save the ship from self-destruction!
Esports Tournaments: Compete and Win Prizes!

More Features:

Customizable Avatars
Customizable Alliance Pages
Level Up XP Ranking System
Player-owned Servers
VR Compatible – Rift & Vive

name: Super Meat Boy Forever
description:
Meat Boy and Bandage Girl have grown as a couple since 2010. It seems like only yesterday the two love birds were escaping from an exploding laboratory in the sky. Now it’s the current year, and they’ve welcomed their daughter Nugget into the world. Their peaceful days enjoying life as a family came to an abrupt end when Dr. Fetus beat the snot out of them with a rusty shovel, and kidnapped Nugget! Now it’s up to Meat Boy and Bandage Girl to rescue their daughter from a lunatic fetus in a jar that can only be described as an incel version of Tony Stark.

- Super Meat Boy Forever is the sequel to Super Meat Boy! This is a new experience that eclipses the original. Don’t stare directly at it unless you still have your eclipse glasses.
- 7200 individually handcrafted levels combine dynamically to give you a new challenge every single time you play. Seven thousand two hundred levels. They said we couldn’t do it, but we did. Who’s they? Don’t ask. They don’t like it when you ask.
- It’s hard, but fair. Nothing in life worth having comes easy. Just ask Dark Soulman.
- Meat Boy and Bandage Girl can fight back. It’s time to unleash the raw fury of parenthood on their foes just like Liam Neeson in that documentary about his family vacation in Paris.
- Bigger boss battles than before. Your mind will be blown. Your socks will be blown off. Team Meat is not liable for any of this.
- Brand new art with stunning detail and resolution. There are a lot of pixels in here. Grab the biggest display you have and watch those dots change color rapidly with gumption. Don’t sit too close though. (If your parents aren’t home you can sit as close as you want we won’t tell, but Team Meat is still not liable for any of this.)
- A soundtrack composed by Ridiculon so intense that the state of Wyoming has issued a ban on all audio devices capable of playing it out of fear that just a single note will cause the dormant super volcano beneath Yellowstone to erupt ushering in a new age of darkness.
- Frame by frame artisan crafted in game animations, and animated cutscenes that will make you experience procedurally generated emotions.
- A story so rich and moving that it makes Citizen Kane look like an unboxing video for a dehumidifier.

name: Fatal Fury First Contact
description: Those legendary wolves stake their claim on a new stage! Utilize earth-shattering special moves and reach for the top! - FATAL FURY newcomers like Rick Strowd and Li Xiangfei clash fists with nostalgic fan-favorites Terry, Geese, and Mai Shiranui! - Easier for beginners thanks to single-lane fighting! Unleash an ultra-lethal POTENTIAL POWER move at the brink of death to turn the tables on your foes! - Invite a friend over for some 1on1 action in either tabletop or handheld mode! Find out who has what it takes to be hailed as the best in Southtown! *The game manual included is from the NEOGEO POCKET COLOR edition and therefore contains control schemes which may vary from those on the Nintendo Switch.

name: Ao Oni X
description:
"There is a sealed tunnel deep in the mountains. Beyond it lies an abandoned village, one from which visitors never return."

After hearing this mysterious urban legend, our protagonists decided to visit an abandoned village on their vacation to test their courage. To their surprise, they find that the village isn't abandoned at all. In fact, it seems quite ordinary...

name: Snowdome
description: For Tan Yan, there is little hope his life will change. It's like his whole life is trapped inside a snowdome, unable to escape. But, what if, one day, he's given the chance to make a change?

name: Holiday Shopping
description:
Holiday Shopping is a short winter VN. It is a somewhat-indirect-prequel to the title Cemetery Mary. It is strongly recommended you achieve the True Ending in Cemetery Mary before you play this game, in order to enjoy the full experience.

This visual novel follows the main character as they are called upon to help others during the holiday season.

name: Progressbar Popup Fighter
description:
Progressbar Popup Fighter is a spin-off game of Progressbar95, initially released on 22 December 2020, developed and published by Spooky House Studios.

It is about not overwhelming the CPU with a lot of pop-ups; if it gets overwhelmed, a BSOD will appear.

Even though the game received some updates that added new content and features, it is safe to assume it has been abandoned due to the lack of updates and discussion about it.

name: Otter Ocean
description: Are otter’s just the oceans’ hamsters? They’re playful, fuzzy, and fit in the palm of your hand (at least in this kawaii game app!). Go on a scavenger hunt to find more members of the cute tamagotchi kawaii family. If you like adventure games with a treasure hunt where you can train your pet animals - Otter Ocean is just for you.

name: Weeny Adventure
description:
Weeny adventure is a tiny challenging platformer game in pixel art style like an old-school game that brings back childhood memories.

Your mission is to run and jump and to grab all the gems before time runs out to find the hidden map to win the level. Your adventure journey is not easy, because you will encounter deadly traps and dangerous monsters.

name: 1 Day Later: Escape Zombie Hospital
description: Escape the hospital full of zombies in a single player stealth action puzzle game. Cool story included ;) Windows version of mobile game rated 4.5 on Google Play with improvements and new features.

name: Present-X
description: This is a shooting game created by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: The Last Planets
description:
This is an infinite and endless run, adventure, arcade, physics based, space and planets exploring game.

Take part to this infinite progression through the dangers of this universe, controlling some planets that are shattered from a great explosion produced somewhere...

name: Pixels at Solstice
description: a short, playable christmas card for the longest nights of the year

name: N Step Steve: Part 1
description: A crew of kittens needs rescuing again. More puzzles stand in your way. This time, you only have N steps to solve them.

name: Friagem
description: A game that mixes the mechanics of pushing boxes to specific locations with elements of horror and suspense.

name: The Snow of Basidia
description: A peaceful town experiences it's first snow. Are you willing to discover the source of this mysterious phenomenon?

name: ClickCells: Summer
description: A casual clicker puzzle simulating real physics.

name: Cafe Simulator
description: Cafe Simulator is an cafe business simulation game. Destruc-Build-Design the best cafe in the world!

name: Cyan
description: Incarnate as Xiaoqing, head to Jinshan base alone to find her sister. In the process, it is necessary to resist the attacks of mutants, solve the mystery of the mechanism, and discover the secrets and conspiracy behind the Jinshan base.

name: Fill and Cross Christmas Riddles
description: The most magical night of the year. It's coming... RIGHT NOW! 120 new levels in Christmas Griddlers!

name: The Evil in the Forest
description: The Evil in the Forest is a 3rd-person fantasy horror adventure game. The game tells you the dark story of a man named Derek Bain - a single father who, being a researcher in the field of natural resources, arrives with his daughter Kate in a mystical forest...

name: Your Chronicle
description: "Let's begin your own story." This is a text-based idle RPG game. There are 1,500+ actions here. It's still growing.

name: Hexdoku
description: Player must fill the grid with different shapes. Each line and area must not contain same shape, just like classic Sudoku game!

name: 600Seconds: The Deep Church
description: Awakening before a church stood in the middle of a meadow, Mutsuki follows a white cat inside and begins to explore. Their wristwatch reads 23:50, on the 15th of July 1927. After 600 seconds have passed, Mutsuki must defeat the monsters that appear and escape from this nightmare.

name: Christmas Adventures: A Winter Night's Dream
description: Shiny snowflakes, jingling bells and magic in the air... All this might not happen, because dark forces want to destroy our Christmas celebrations... again. We need your help!

name: BOT.vinnik Chess: Opening Traps
description: Do you think Queen's Gambit is a TV series, comrade? WRONG! It is a Chess opening! If you don't even know that, you have a lot to learn! A good chess player should know the chess openings and, more important, how to avoid their traps! Enroll NOW and find out how!

name: Puzzle: Stone Blocks
description: Free version of the Games for meditation and relaxation. Has 5 paid add-ons.

name: Override 2: Super Mech League - Ultraman
description: This DLC unlocks Ultraman as a playable character Override 2: Super Mech League.

name: 勇者的十日人生
description: Sin descripción

name: Wave Rider
description: Wave Rider is a fast racing game where gravity-defying machines meet at the finish line to return control to a virtual world. Race through many bending roads, make waves with your machine to gain power, and boost to the end before the timer reaches zero.

name: Chill X
description: Chill is a relaxing, minimalist maze game.

name: Mini Moves: Among Stars
description: Mini moves in the giant universe, simplicity is what you need to achieve your goals.

name: Secrets of Magic 4: Potion Master
description: Are you fond of magic potions and haunting creatures? Well, join in this unforgettable journey to the roots of magic! Traverse the Forbidden Forest, find extraordinary potion ingredients, and master their magic properties in this thrilling match 3 game.

name: MagVigor
description: MagVigor — a third-person real-time multiplayer RPG. Confrontations of magicians and knights on separate arenas in PvP battles. Fight! Or run!

name: The Lodge
description: A first-person, psychological horror game, The Lodge takes players on a journey into the horrors of a twisted mind.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Girl Breaker Lily
description: AboutSmash the girl's body with a small ball layer of camouflage, see her real side. Be careful not to let the ball fall off the screen, which will start over.FeatureThe DLC include full missions

name: Shu's Misfortune
description: Shu's Misfortune is a sample RPG made in RPG Maker MZ. As Shu, end your father's haute couture legacy by unraveling his empire of fashion.

name: Agent of Chaos
description: Agent of Chaos is a top-down wave survival game about an avatar of chaos using powerful elemental weapons to defeat hordes of heroes.

name: Fiendish Thieves
description: Home Alone meets Frankenstein Filled with lots of laughs and slapstick humour. You choose the actions of the bungling burglars who search an abandoned warehouse For a rare vintage pocket watch, and the obsessed film fan munching on snacks watching the events unfold.

name: Cinderella Phenomenon: Evermore
description: Cinderella Phenomenon: Evermore is a visual novel fandisk for Cinderella Phenomenon. This game is is akin to an extended epilogue, containing five chapters of additional content that occur after the good endings of the original game.

name: Train Sim World 2: Hauptstrecke München - Augsburg Route Add-On
description: Race through Bavaria and experience the hustle and bustle of modern commuting with Train Sim World 2: Hauptstrecke München - Augsburg.

name: Bloody Service
description: The conjoined twins were bullied and humiliated... Now justice will be served! BLOODY SERVICE is a dark, gory and violent coming-of-age slasher FMV Visual Novel with gruesome deaths and clever one-liners related to tennis. Game, set, machete!

name: Table Soccer Club
description: A Table Soccer / Foosball game that allows you to establish a team with all different kind of skills to conquer the leagues. Challenge a friend to compete on the same screen or explorer your own career as a Table Soccer Manager.

name: Spooky Speakeasy
description: Make and shake some truly monstrous drinks in this casual bartending simulator!

name: Mahjong Adventure
description:
Mahjong Adventure is a mahjong game based on a classic Chinese game.
Great fit for players who love games like brain puzzles, crossword, chess, mahjong, word search, solitaire, match-3 and other smart games and puzzle brain games. Develop your mind and patience and strategy skills.

name: Rain Drop
description: Journey from the Upper Atmosphere through futuristic dystopian cyberscapes, as a Rain Drop.

name: Futa Fix Dick Dine and Dash
description: Emily has a problem and it's not a little one. Join her and her friends on this hybrid visual novel adventure with select animated scenes. A slice of life comedy featuring Emily coming to terms with becoming a futa and all that comes with it.

name: Vicewave
description: Welcome back to the 80s! A 20-year-old boy named James Bernett is a ghetto boy with ambitions who wants to get everything from the world at once. Very soon, he will create his own criminal empire, built on the sale of drugs and become the most influential drug baron in the city of Los Riveros!

name: Gloomy Toons
Round 99
description: Are you ready to shoot your way and jump around 99 rounds? Are you ready to destroy everything in 12 levels and fight insane bosses?! Are you ready to customize your character? Are you ready to upgrade your health and guns? You probably aren't, but maybe you want to play Round 99 anyways.

name: Override 2: Super Mech League - Ultraman Deluxe Edition
description: The gigantic robot brawler is Mech-ing a super-charged comeback in Override 2: Super Mech League! Fight in Mech Leagues and soar to new heights, aiming to be the best mech pilot. Pick your playstyle across match types including 1v1, 2v2, free-for-all and several games such as Xenoswarm, King of the Hill and more. Unlock a slew of cosmetics and attachments for your mech of choice in the Garage.

name: Animal Rescuer
description: Animal Rescuer is helping lovely animals through exploring an epic world with faster gameplay and increased quest and combat intensity.

name: Ori Collector's Edition
description: The Ori series sits atop the mantle of platforming greatness — artistically profound, technically impressive, and obsessively tuned gameplay. And for the first time ever, Ori and the Blind Forest and its followup, Ori and Will of the Wisps are available together in a premium physical Collector’s Edition. In true iam8bit fashion, we’ve spared no detail and collaborated intensely with developer Moon Studios to create this immaculately custom collection. Contions: Premium “Transforming” Display Box with Glow-in-the-Dark Finish, Majestic Stained Glass style Art Piece, “The Flora & Fauna of Ori” Field Guide, Sketchbook Zine featuring rarely seen production art, Collectible Art Card Set, Hard Enamel, Glow-in-the-Dark Pin, Digital Download Cards for Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps soundtracks by composer Gareth Coker and Physical Editions of Ori and the Will of the Wisps and Ori and the Blind Forest, featuring Exclusive, Reversible Cover Art.

name: Waiting for the Raven
description: Become Master of Spies, plant connections and agents in the underworld. Who will you join? Who may be betrayed? Decipher Letters, Solve Mysteries, Manage Businesses, Spy, Bribe, Abduct, Murder, Seduce in an experimental atmospheric hybrid of first-person & top-down espionage experience.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Challenger Pack 8
description:
Challenger Pack 8 was revealed to be Sephiroth from Final Fantasy VII at The Game Awards.
The character could be unlocked early, by players who had purchased the DLC or Season Pass, by defeating Sephiroth in an in-game challenge mode only available for the 5 days before release.

"Sephiroth, armed with his ruthless Masamune sword and a desire to destroy, joins the Super Smash Bros. Ultimate game as a part of the Fighters Pass Vol 2 DLC! This silver-haired swordsman is Cloud’s arch nemesis and one of the most iconic villains in gaming. Don’t be fooled by his chillingly calm demeanor, Sephiroth can deal some white-hot damage."

name: BattleCourt
description: BattleCourt: a Casual Horde Survival Looter and Shooter. Millions of combinations of guns, survive as long as you can.

name: On Target VR Darts
description: On Target VR Darts is a realistic physics-based darts simulation. Play a game of Freethrow or 501/301 versus AI in The Black Hat Tavern. This fully immersive VR darts experience is unlike anything you’ve ever experienced. Multiplayer with additional game modes and DLC coming in early 2019!

name: Christmas Mosaic Puzzle
description: The time for winter wonders begins with Christmas Mosaic Puzzle! 120 unique and exciting puzzles for any age!

name: IdleCoin
description: IdleCoin is a real-time cryptocurrency mining and management simulation.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 44: Winter Holiday
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario World: Neeberz's Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: Pieces of My Heart
description: Date beautiful women and solve tricky puzzles in Pieces of my Heart, a premium animated jigsaw puzzle game. Beautiful women are looking for love, by solving their puzzles you unlock their hearts and companionship.

name: Bridge to Another World: Secrets of the Nutcracker
description: Something is terribly wrong in the toy world, and only you can help!

name: TerraTech: Fantabulous Contraptions
description: Follow in the footsteps of engineering pioneers with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins for Better Future (Dirigible) and Geo Corp (Locomotive) corporations.

name: TerraTech: Warriors of Future Past
description: Blending influences from the warriors of Feudal Japan and classic Mecha-Anime, this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins for the Venture (Shinobi) and Hawkeye (Shogun) corporations with give your techs an iconic look.

name: Jewel Vampire Castle
description:
Beautiful vampire Elina has been guarding the castle for hundreds of years.
Now we need to help Elina to protect the vampire castle!

name: Jay Schilling's Edge of Chaos
description: A text adventure mystery with a modern parser.

name: Wizard's Adventure
description: As a wizard, you are pretty powerful and also have a pretty powerful apatite! This game takes you on an adventure from a dark dungeon, to a lush forest, to a brisk and beautiful mountain top!

name: Blizzard Blowout 64
description: A N64 Styled, Fast-Paced Down Hill Rolling Game

name: Heavy Metal Babes
description: Heavy Metal Babes is a turn-based RPG strategy game featuring classic mechanics infused with steamy H-Scenes and an engaging action-packed gameplay. Build your team of hot XEN units, command them into battle and defeat your opponents!

name: Singularity
description: A Virtual Reality Art piece, exploring the Law of accelerating returns and the development of A.I.

name: Savage
description: This is an adventure game in the wild.

name: Santa Claus in Trouble HD
description: Help Santa to collect lost christmas presents in this wonderful 3D Jump'n'Run experience. An exciting arcade adventure is just waiting for the kids in your life and especially the kid in you!

name: Amborettio
description: Amborettio is a post-apocalyptic mining/survival RPG with a focus on crafting, equipment upgrades, and resource management. Mine, craft, and fight your way through the caverns as you try to uncover the truth about the PR0T3CH coalition's goals.

name: Tales of Glory 2: Retaliation
description: Follow the adventure of Andrew "Dog" Carter, a former SAS operative and his International Task Force squad as they fight against a global terrorist organization called Quantum in Tales Of Glory 2 - Retaliation, a VR tactical shooter adventure mixing huge immersive battles against hundreds of NPCs and infiltration missions.

name: Bridge to Another World: Secrets of the Nutcracker - Collector's Edition
description: Something is terribly wrong in the toy world, and only you can help!

name: Soft Wind
description: Soft Wind is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Zup! Z
description: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Monstrum
description: Monstrum is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. It includes 2 playable monsters (Brute & Fiend), 1 playable mortal (Prisoner Borisov), and a new map (Monstrum Madness).

name: Azlan: Rise of the Burlpups
description: New to VR or Tower Defense? Learn to Plan, attack & defend in this immersive VR strategy game. Get ready for massive tower defense battles in VR as AZLAN defends Zalolo Land from total ruin. With a vast arsenal of upgradable cannons, arrows, and crystal towers at your command, can your skill & craft save Zalolo from Rise of the...

name: Fishing Sim World: Pro Tour + The Catch: Carp & Coarse
description: Fishing Sim World Pro Tour + The Catch: Carp & Coarse together in one fantastic fishing bundle!

name: Prepare
description: You are an American soldier with outstanding achievements. You are invited to participate in an elite training program. Give your all and try to get better in every unit.

name: Tactical Warfare Simulator
description: It's the War to End All Wars and you have joined the ranks of the new breed of soldier, the fighter pilot.

name: Jack's Labyrinth
description: For collecting orbs, you are awarded points. The levels are a kind of labyrinth in which you need to maneuver so as not to get caught by enemies.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season VI - Scourge of Winter
description:
The worst winter in living memory holds the North in an icy grip. Under cover of this freezing darkness, a horde of bandits, renegades, and exiles known as the Desecrators has conquered Ostaria. Under the command of the terrifying Scourge of Winter, a mysterious figure who plagued the land in legends, these brigands thrive on greed and unending cruelty.

As the Desecrators sow terror across the North, the survivors of their brutal assault flee south to Ungverija, seeking to join forces with any heroes who will take a stand against terror. Thanes and freemen, knights and kings must all join together in a desperate alliance to deliver Ostaria from the evil of the Scourge of Winter, and drive back the Desecrators by winter's end.

name: Hand Simulator: Horror
description: Fear clouds the mind. Fear paralyzes the body. If your hands are shaking with fear, you will remain in this hell forever.

name: Mini Car Money Chase
description: Race for big money while running away from the police. In this miniature arcade game, you have to participate in an endless race for money.

name: Out For Delivery
description:
Out For Delivery is a 42 minute playable documentary shot with a 360-degree camera. The slice-of-life experience follows a food delivery courier in Beijing on January 23, 2020, the day before Lunar New Year's Eve, and the day Wuhan shut down due to COVID-19.

Players experience the game by looking around and observing the courier's journey. Minimal narration provides context that players wouldn't otherwise know, while the world itself displays voluminous anecdotal information. A phone acts as a journaling, observational, and navigational supplement.

name: Poco In Dungeon
description: ​Let's get Poco-chan out of the fortress! ​This game is a TPS game. ​Use the actions of shooting, flying, swimming, and catch & down to get Poco-chan out of the fortress of the fantasy world.

name: Whizz Ball
description: Whizz Ball is a high speed cross between Pong, Breakout and Pinball. Play against your friends with 4 player local support, or play single player against the computer.

name: Lab Craft Survival
description: Unique survival game with interesting mechanics: reproduction, infinite character development, diseases and treatments, evolution, herbalism, farming, building, ecosystem, flexible mechanics, ever-changing and complicating environment.

name: Hentai Dates
description: Hello my love. Come and meet me at Hentai Dates. I am Clitie and I am looking forward to guiding you to meet several girls that you will be happy to meet.

name: Head Worms
description: Fear and anxiety ravage your mind in Head Worms, a survival horror filled with perpetual terror and disorienting challenges.

name: Lumber Party
description: An online or local multiplayer space monkey racing platformer. Fight your way to the top to grab the banana with tons of different ways to play.

name: Microjob
description: Microjob is an interactive language learning game. It teaches words through objects / pictures, daily conversations with simple dialogues, and actions with tiny tasks. It's main purpose to give you courage about your first real life listening and speaking experience.

name: GyroBlade
description: A retro 2D vertical scroll shooter.

name: Road to Adventure!
description: Help Tommy destroy The Evil Corporation, save the enviroment, the forest and his friends. A beautiful, funny and challenging game awaits!

name: Air Bounce: The Jump 'n' Run Challenge
description: Jump or Die! AIR BOUNCE - THE JUMP 'N' RUN CHALLENGE is a fast-paced crazy difficult sometimes rage-inducing 3d first-person platformer. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Fishticuffs
description: A bullet hell fishing game, this. Bop fish with your hook, do not miss. With loot from the blue, a way is paved to, a fishing apotheosis.

name: Werewolf Princess Kaguya
description: A stylish & exciting action game! Journey through medieval Japan, rendered in beautiful pixel art, to reach the moon and defeat Mother Kaguya!

name: PBA Pro Bowling 2021
description: PBA Pro Bowling 2021 is the ultimate game for all bowling fans! Play online versus your friends, or start your PBA Career in a deep single player experience. This game has something for everyone with options for both an authentic simulation mode or an explosive arcade style of gameplay!

name: Oceanarium
description: Oceanarium is an underwater adventure game about the great conjunction of Jupiter and Saturn.

name: Gravulse
description: Welcome to Gravulse, an innovative space curvature laboratory that tries to turn the laws of physics around, literally. Here you have to go through many test levels using various new technologies!

name: Mython Island
description: Mython Island is a monster catching RPG with rogue-like elements! Choose creatures known as Mython to add to your party, choose your path forward, fight strong enemies, and grow together to uncover the truth of Mython Island!

name: Kinesis
description: Kinesis is a new first-person single player puzzle platformer brought to you by Cosmic Key. Explore a new ancient sci-fi realm known as kinesis, solving mysteries behind your enigmatic powers left behind by the ancestors. Wield these powers to explore Kinesis, solving puzzles around kinetic energy.

name: Breath
description:
Breath is not an easy game, but it is not a long game too.

Start as a simple life-form and evolve your way by defeating the bosses in any order you wish. One ability gained from one boss can help you to defeat another one.

Can you beat the game without deaths? How fast can you beat it? Try yourself in "1 Life Mode" and "SpeedRun Mode" with in-game clock! Compete against your own time or set a custom time to try to be the fastest in the world!

Play multiple times trying different routes and, as you play, unlock new abilities to start the game with, adding layers of complexity.

Don't forget to try to find all the hidden spider webs.

Life is but a Breath!

name: HeadWorms
description: Fear and anxiety ravage your mind in Head Worms, a survival horror filled with perpetual terror and disorienting challenges. Find clues, solve puzzles, hide, and survive in this grizzly first person survival horror simulator.

name: Malmyr
description: Malmyr is a hybrid of city building and automation games. In contrast to other well known games of these genres the player is not meant to build the biggest city or largest factory. Malmyr's gameplay is focused on logic and creativity to accomplish the game's challenges. Each of the 12 missions of Malmyr's storyline have their own look & feel and compel the player to learn something new. Especially the quite unique resource transport mechanics stand out.

name: All Hail the Cook-o-tron
description: All Hail the Cook-o-tron is a physics-based VR cooking game. You play as a contender in a cooking competition designed to hone your cooking and time management skills to ultimately please the robotic food critic known as the Cook-o-tron.

name: Override 2: Super Mech League
description:
The gigantic robot brawler is Mech-ing a super-charged comeback in Override 2: Super Mech League!

Seven years after the Xenotypes that invaded Earth have been eradicated, the giant mechs that were once the planet’s defenders are now their entertainers in global mech battle leagues. As a new pilot of these repurposed weapons of war, climb the ranks and represent your Club with a tuned-up roster of returning and new mechs, each with their own unique abilities, moves, and super-charged attacks. Override 2: Super Mech League is playable both in single player and multiplayer campaigns for up to 4 players locally and online in stages set all over the world.

Start as a new pilot and propel yourself through the ranks in a deep and robust Career Mode. Join Mech Leagues and earn reputation by competing in Arenas located across the globe. Duke it out with a tuned-up roster of returning robots and new mechs across various versus and co-op game modes of up to 4 players online and locally. Defeat your opponents using an arsenal of unique moves including super-charged ranged attacks, metal-busting combos, or an arena-shattering ultimate attack!

name: Gem Deeps
description: While chasing a stolen magic crystal, you are stumbling upon an ancient underworld civilization and scripts of even older origin. Explore this realm, fight its armies, and reveal its lore in this hand-painted, action-adventure platforming RPG.

name: Midjungard
description: A Tolkienesque Multiplayer Game set in the primeval world of a pre-Viking Midjungard. PvP and PvE multiplayer modes. Exquisite level design and beautiful lighting. Thrilling combat.

name: Coromon
description: Coromon is a modern monster taming game with retro pixelart. Coromon brings an immersive storyline, strategic turn-based combat and challenging puzzles to a classic genre.

name: Spooky Starlets
description: Create the films of your wet dreams! Spooky Starlets tasks you to run an adult film studio staffed by sultry undead beings.

name: Mood Bye
description: MOOD BYE - The Last Flash Game - a game about saying or not saying goodbye and about the end of Flash.

name: Date with Modeus
description:
Let me ask you this:
"Do you want to have a lovely date with Modeus? "
Well... In this silly little Visual Novel game, You can do just that :D

name: Turnabout Reality
description: Phoenix Wright must defend a man accused of attacking his daughter in front of school grounds. Facing off against an unfamiliar prosecutor, Phoenix discovers that things aren't exactly as they seem in this case. Or in this world, for that matter.

name: Santa Run
description:
Santa Run is a free Christmas game that was created in seven days for all Commodore Amiga fans.

Control Santa as you leap from roof to roof and deliver presents down the chimneys.

Santa Run is a score based game, if you reach the end of the street you will have completed the game. A nice greeting awaits at the end of the game.

name: Mega Man X2: Zero Playable
description: Sin descripción

name: Shells Delivery Deluxe
description: This is a Kaizo Light romhack with Shell Jumps challenges. A version of Shells Delivery (previous version), but reformulated, with more challenges, backgrounds and a new map. Challenges much more optimized.

name: Mystic Messenger: Ray's After Ending
description: DLC that can be played regardless of progress in Ray's route. Takes place two weeks after Ray's good ending.

name: Tower of Kalemonvo
description: Crawl to the top of the Tower of Kalemonvo, a hardcore isometric ARPG experience with randomly generated levels meant for fans of slower paced action games. Fight cultists, scavenge for magical items, use powerful spells and customize your stats and skills!

name: Running MrBeast
description: MrBeast will you help the little piggy to survive through its journey and save your fortune from stealing?

name: Peko Pop
description:
Move your fingers around the sweet & sour Fruits
Match 3 or more of them to POP!
Mind-popping missions await you at every stage
Use various items to clear the stages sweeter & easier

If you love Peko and enjoy puzzle games, you must try it!

name: Ninja Arashi 2
description:
Ninja Arashi 2 continues the legacy of the first ninja game.
In this episode 2, you play as the raging Arashi, who finally escapes from the frozen prison which was created by Dosu, a cruel evil shadow demon. Arashi continues his pursuit after Dosu to rescue his son and unveil the shadow behind Dosu's plan. However, the journey will be much more challenging this time.
Ninja Arashi 2 features simple yet addicting gameplay, giving you thrilling moments and unexpected experiences. The RPG elements allow you to upgrade your ninja skills and dwell into the depth of the game mechanic.

name: SpiritSurge
description: SpiritSurge is a turn-based, classic RPG set in the odd-yet-fantastical world of Launell. You fill the shoes of Nathaniel Andrews, a citizen of the chaotic country Conterra. He and his peers find themselves unwillingly wrapped up in the machinations of the many corporeal and spiritual powers that be, engaging in combat when needed

name: Quake: Xmas Jam 2020
description:
Quake: Xmas Jam 2020 is a Quake map pack held annually.
It is currently the second biggest Quake map pack in file size, next to Arcane Dimension. This pack features 19 small maps in varying styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It runs on Arcane Dimensions 1.8 (included) and comes with some additional content like sounds, models, skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included.

name: Doodle Jump 2
description:
The most addictive game on the App Store is all new with delightful new environments, the cutest new characters, fun new platform challenges and some silly new monsters.

Jump up on platforms and collect stars to unlock cool new characters and exciting new environments.

Unlock all the levels and collect all the characters! Beat your friends’ high scores and become the new Doodle Jump King!

name: Tracer
description:
A neon, heart pounding, endless arcade racer!

Race down the gauntlet, faster and faster! How far, and how fast, can you go before you crash?

name: Kissa
description: take your cat for a walk

name: Cookie's Bakery
description:
Bake cookies and celebrate the holidays!

Four days until the annual Winter Festival! It sure is a busy time in your bakery, but you will help your fellow citizens, by providing them with bite-sized calm and contemplation: delicious cookies!

name: Waking Nightmare
description: A short horror game for the Gameboy Color

name: Cats on Mars
description: Play a dancing space cat in this pixel rhythm RPG!

name: Borbo's Quest
description: Borbo's Quest is a short adventure game in which you play as Borbo, a 10 year-old kid set on a quest to retrieve their stolen birthday cake. Journey through a charming puzzle-filled world to track down Nasty Cake Jake and retrieve your precious cake.

name: 100 Hidden Aliens
description: Hidden object game in the cosmic setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Game for all ages.

name: Nightshift
description: Welcome to nightshift! You are a retired Detective, and you get a note in your office from the police department but, upon the note you have to find out who murdered Kakig Kasajian but in the house it won't be easy to find the Killer. Now just remember, always look but never look in the past

name: Recycle My World
