description: An adventure game where you travel across the country and recycle everything, sell to customers, build renewable energy platforms and save the world. Build up your portfolio and impress the company you want to work for. Choose how to progress in the game with unique results, what will you do?

name: The Deepest
description: Explore the depths, gather materials, these caves must have an end. Beware of creatures and save materials, look for guiding lights.

name: Pandemos
description: Pandemos: Embark on this dangerous and fun pixelated dystopia, where the Protectors defend the harmless Cells from a massive invasion of dangerous virus agents of unknown origin.

name: Ayoub
description: A school themed drama visual novel

name: Death Park 2
description: Fight monsters, solve puzzles and uncover Farland's secret and the clown's origin in this sci-fi horror game!

name: Healing Animal
description: Healing Animals is a game where you help out adorable animals on a relaxing journey, and escape from the dark reality with a blind girl called Anna. Find the puzzle pieces to solve problems in animal town to help Anna heal her emotional wounds.

name: Waronoi
description: Imagine a chess board where you can zoom in to see that every piece, is made up by several smaller pieces, which is made up by several smaller pieces, etc. Waronoi is a modern military real-time strategy game on a breath taking scale, where the fate of an entire army can be altered by a single unit.

name: Dungeon Limbus
description: Pixel art! Classic Roguelike! Tile maps and turns! Infinite dungeon randomly generated! Interesting collection elements and multi-endings to grow villages & weapon!

name: Cecil Run
description: Arrows fall randomly on Cecil as he continues to run away from danger avoiding pits and gaps while collecting meat and treasure. Survive long enough and the dentist will become agitated, get into his B-52 and bomb Cecil like the Dresden Cathedral. Once Cecil collects 10 pieces of meat, the hamburger will drop.

name: ExoTanks MOBA
description: A fast-paced Sci-Fi MOBA Shooter game based on tank warfare on the vast areas of planet Mars! Master unique tanks, each having particular abilities, mechanics, and appearance. Upgrade your tank during the battle. Immerse yourself in the Sci-Fi world.

name: Forget-me-Not
description: After spending sixteen years away from the manor she grew up at, Melissa returns to it as the new owner. Though, not only empty hallways greet her return...

name: Evil Wizard
description: Small castle surrounded by mountains, using custom textures by Makkon

name: One Rule
description: Make your way to the finish line as you roll around the colorful, epic course by pushing and moving big and small objects while trying not to fall in the hot bubbling lava. This Is A Roll A Ball Game.

name: Blooms
description:
blooms is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars two characters, Nonoka and Kiribana. The point of the game is to sleep in the bed and collect effects while dreaming. You always start off as Nonoka but can switch characters at any point. In Nonoka's bedroom, there is a music box where the player can access a sound test with unlockable tracks. In Kiribana's bedroom there is a minigame on her bookshelf called Little RPG.

Most of the time, it doesn't really matter which character the player controls, since the dream worlds are the same for both characters and effects are even shared in both of their inventories once collected. However there are a few situations where one character can do one thing where the other refuses or is unable to do the same thing.

Along with collecting effects, there are 3 additional menu types to be found hidden throughout the dream world.

name: Project Makeover
description: Come to the rescue of those in need and give them a makeover so they can achieve their dreams! Choose the most chic clothes, hairstyles, makeup and even furniture! Take on histrionic characters like egotistical fashion icons, conniving assistants, or headstrong clients in need of a new wardrobe. Solve complex fashion puzzles to find the perfect look. And don't forget to customize your avatar to create your own style!

name: Monster Girl Incursion
description: This game offers a simple, challenging and fun gameplay with lots of beautiful monster girls. While avoiding the various combat mechanics, you collect points to counterattack. Through your counterattacks, the monster girls lose their clothing.

name: Flower in the Snow: Resurrection
description: What is going to be acted before you is——Blossom in the shackles, but deep down in your bone, suspension and romantic.

name: Hentai Nureta Puzzle Cyberpunk
description: Cyberpunk Hentai Puzzle is available NOW. PLAY the extremely relaxing game in cyberpunk world. Artistic images for anime hentai fans from around the world.Listen to music and arrange pictures with cute girls in HOT scenes.

name: Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness
description: 《Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness》is a card-based puzzle game with RPG components. Your job is to lead different girls to advance their adventure levels in a Virtual Reality Game.

name: Pray and Spray
description: Pray And Spray is an online first-person arena shooter. Grab a gun and defend yourself from the opposing team of extraterrestrials.

name: No Cure 2
description: The zombies are hiding in plain sight and your job is still to find and kill them.

name: The Cat Banny
description: The Cat Banny is a puzzle, a story of a lost cat trapped in a dreams world.

name: Konaste Gitadora
description:
The home cloud version of the arcade game Gitadora, as part of Konami's Konaste Game Station line of arcade game versions.

The game's theme is based on the game Gitadora Nex+Age, but the song list and progression system are brand new.

name: Aardvark
description: An open platform for building, sharing, and using augmented reality gadgets that run on top of virtual reality experiences

name: Knot Fiction!
description: The second couple project following Harmon Ey is a work that focuses on flirting with an older bride!

name: Grow Planet
description: An HTML5 remake of the original game in On Nakayama's GROW puzzle game series.

name: Bright Lancer
description: Hyper Light Drifter meets Hades in a fast-paced pixel art adventure!

name: Shoot & Destroy
description:
Shoot & Destroy is a short modern 1-bit top-down shoot'em up.

An outer space threat is at large destroying and conquering the galaxy.
Fly through 4 stages and defeat the Boss.

name: Luobu
description: Luobu was a Chinese localized edition of Roblox made for mainland China by Tencent Interactive Entertainment Group and Roblox Corporation.

name: Mystic Messenger: Bad Jumin & After
description: DLC that unlocks after completing Jumin's Bad Story Ending 2. This DLC takes place two months after his bad story ending.

name: Jordy x Tamagotchi
description: The Jordy x Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model exclusive to South Korea, based on the NINIZ mascot character Jordy.

name: Telusfax
description:
Telusfax is a archaeo-game set in the teletext system of a British television station one day in a half-remembered 2003.

Browse the system to locate the names of the presenters of five different tv shows.

Explore over 50 pages of pseudo-2003 content.
Track down forgotten celebrities.
Get the most up-to-date news regarding the foot and mouth pandemic.
Get the latest football scores.
Read about the music of the day.

name: Tone's froggy adventure!
description: hang out in a pond and meet some frogs!

name: Pokémon Xenoverse: Per Aspera Ad Astra
description: A Pokémon fan game developed by Team WEEDle (based in Italy). In this Pokémon adventure, you will discover a brand new world with its own authentic story, a unique visual and narrative atmosphere, and innovative features. There are so many new fan-made Pokemon and original areas to explore as you uncover more secrets about the mysteries of the world and story.

name: Melody
description:
Melody is a music game based on the rhythm change to hit the key.
When the note reaches the rhythm point, press the up, down, left and right keys to accurately perform the song.
Each song is carefully crafted, interesting and challenging

name: Christmas Break
description: Christmas Break is an arcade game that lets the user break Xmas bricks with a unique Christmas paddle and ball.

name: Space Cats Saga: Chapter I
description:
Space Cats Saga: Chapter I is the first Chapter of a series of megawads by DerTimmy
Comes with its own Campaign "Spaceship". 10 regular Maps and two secret ones. Its first Secret level gives you a New Game+ option to start the game with most weapons. Its second one (Encore! Slaughterfest! Secret 2) starts directly after you beat the campaign on Ultra-Violence. Chapter I is a unique episode with its own new arsenal of weapons, compatible with most megawads and add-ons.

name: Barb
description: Experience the life of Barbara, an ordinary person with very normal daily rituals... or is there more to it

name: Elva the Eco Dragon
description: Elva has arrived at our planet with one mission: show us how to save Earth, how to clean cities, mountains, the sea, and how to save animals and forests. Ready to save Earth?

name: A Graveyard for Dreams
description: A pixelart metroidvania where you explore the world of dreams.

name: Pit of Babel
description: Spiral to Me, Spiral Together

name: I Opened the Walls and Found Something Beautiful
description: The world is more than you thought.

name: Swap
description: Sin descripción

name: Card Guardians
description:
Welcome to the world of Valentia! Build your deck of cards and prepare for strategic CCG battles against monsters and the Guardians of Chaos.
In Card Guardians, you need to win battles against monsters and build a battle card deck to defeat the Guardians of Chaos. Choose the hero of your RPG adventure, create CCG battle strategies, and discover various unexplored realms throughout the Valentia. And beware of dangers! There are dungeons, castles, forests, and deserts that harbor dangerous enemies, with the difficulty of roguelike games.
Restore peace to Valentia and become the master duel of the deck of battle cards. Download Card Guardians now and explore a roguelike world with dangers and epic stories!

name: The Spirit of Snowflake
description: Platform game where you incarnate a ghost and go through lasers and fireballs on a background of epic music. You can create your own levels and share them with your friends...

name: Furry Shades of Gay
description: Love Stories is a game about love, queer relationships, hot gay sex and slapstick humor. Five furry stories full of wit, tough decisions, and sweaty, raunchy humping.Features branching narrative, multiple different scenarios and animated sex scenes!

name: Fight For Eden
description: Fight For Eden is a fantasy action-RPG VR game where you will follow the story of a young orc enrolled to fight against the half elves' oppression.

name: Fission
description: Fission - is a casual game where you control a dark cube that moves forward. You need to break the golden cubes. For each gold cube you get one point. But if you come across gray rectangles, you will immediately lose and have to start over. How many points can you collect?

name: Artists of the World Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: 60 Parseconds! Bundle
description: The dark comedy atomic adventure duo: 60 Seconds! Reatomized and 60 Parsecs!. Scavenge, make difficult decisions and maybe survive. Or not.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Bavarian Castle
description: This free DLC will add the famous and romantic 19th-century bavarian castle to the world of Fernbus Simulator.

name: Magical Swordmaiden: Riru's Grand Adventure
description: After receiving a letter from her brother about strange events happening in his town, Tanya, along with her apprentice Riru, travel to Cain village to investigate.

name: Harvest Island: Beginnings
description: Play the first chapter of Harvest Island, an upcoming pixel-art, cute, semi-farming simulator set on a remote island. Take on the role of Will and help your sister catch a raccoon to offer to the gods. Inspired by Stardew Valley, Harvest Moon, and Rune Factory.

name: Fear the Dark Unknown: James
description: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

name: Ride 4: Ultimate 2020
description: Buy Ultimate 2020 and expand your gaming experience with 5 exclusive bikes and 10 extra events.

name: The Perfect Shape
description: An action precision platformer to test your dexterity, wit and patience

name: Kiiroi Hana
description: Kiiroi Hana is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.

name: Visitations
description: Change your mind by visiting kaleidoscopic, cathedral-like spaces designed to relax, entrance and enhance.

name: Mister Universe
description: In this game you have to go through a difficult path - from a mere mortal to Mr. Universe, the legend of sports and cinema, whose list is achievements updated in real time.

name: WGRealms: Demon Throne
description: WGRealms: Demon Throne is a standalone Duke Nukem 3D Total Conversion though the Eduke32 source port. A remake of WGRealms 2: Siege Breaker and sequel to WGRealms, It follows The Duke over 3 different realms with a dark fantasy/medieval theme and boasts 25 levels, 20 new enemies and 10 new bosses, as well as all new graphics, a whole arsenal of new weapons and two playable characters, Duke Nukem and Jedrik.

name: Shatris: Infinite Puzzles
description: Insert mysterious runes back into their sockets! Identify correct shape combinations and solve hundreds of puzzles in this world of pure relaxation!

name: Hentai Forever
description: Hentai Forever is a casual puzzle game, you need to move parts of the image to restore the drawing.

name: The Wormaid
description: The Wormaid is a space filling puzzle game, drawn in a pixel art style, where you can discover the strange inhabitants of a forsaken castle. From the ocean shore, journey through the labyrinth and uncover the secrets of each room.

name: A Very Bad Christmas Eve
description: Could you save Christmas if you are the only Elf Santa Claus can count on? Challenge yourself in the single-player action-adventure puzzle game A Very Bad Christmas Eve tailor-made for the VR platform.

name: Shikaku Shapes
description: Shikaku Shapes is played on a rectangular grid. Some of the squares in the grid are numbered. The objective is to divide the grid into rectangular and square pieces such that each piece contains exactly one number, and that number represents the area of the rectangle.

name: Covid City
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Tennis
description: VS. Tennis is a sports game released by Nintendo in 1984. This work can be played this game with up to 4 players. You can compete with each other in singles play or play together in doubles play. The key to victory is to use two different types of hitting balls: shots and lobs.

name: Flying Hero X
description: Evil unicorns conquered Meow York City! It's about time to unleash your true hero skill and get some revenge! Save all the cute kitten in this thriving city on a beautiful island and upgrade your gear to fly faster than any other hero ever! And finally... show those unicorns what you're made of! FLYING HERO X offers an explorable GTA styled open world with lots of missions and dozens of easter eggs and hidden areas to discover (including a Cow- Level).

name: Cattch
description: Colourful and enthralling platform game with the bold anthropomorphic animal as protagonist! Meet the Cattch!

name: Life of Fly
description:
Life of Fly features 12 short stories each revolving around the life and thoughts of another fly. 
It is an interesting yet relaxing narrative flight game like no other. 
 
You jump into the role of a little fly which is collecting it thought while exploring its own living environment. 
The most interesting content of the game is on a meta-level where each fly talks about its life, about some things that happened to them, and about some almost philosophical thoughts they had. 
 
Be prepared to experience some very unusual content, some interesting thoughts that go way beyond the normal life of a fly, and some entertaining short stories with a twist.

name: A.I.M.$ (All You Need Is Money)
description:
A.I.M.$: All you need Is Money is a free-to-play third-person shooter game. It was developed and published by NHN PlayArt Corp. 
51 players fight each other to rob money, collect the most money and survive, taking collected money to home, with 10+ characters in Gokuten City. 
Weapons and skills can be used to destroy ATMs and Targets, or kill enemies such as Elite Soldiers and other competitors. The one in 51 players who collected the most money and survived for 4 minutes is crowned the MVG (Most Valuable Gang). If they were the last player standing, they are also crowned the Kingpin.

name: Zombies on a cruise
description: Zombies on a cruise is a single player survival strategy game set on a cruise ship that falls to Zombie Apocalypse after infection to co-passenger on another shore excursion. Nothing is more hostile and intense than a closed environment like a cruise ship. Players begin the game with nothing to defend themselves and no protection whatsoever. To finish the game, they are required to escape to a remote island using a lifeboat.

name: Paralyzed
description: Paralyzed is a challenging precision platformer with a simple objective: reach the end of each level. The challenge is that you have no input on your movement, only the color of your cube. Match your color with whatever approaches or you'll quickly meet your end. Timing is key!

name: Xenoverse: Per Aspera Ad Astra
description: Xenoverse: Per Aspera Ad Astra is a Pokémon fangame made by Team Weedle in collaboration with Élite4. The game, made in RPG Maker MV + Pokémon Essentials, is set in the brand new region of Eldiw and features 160 new species of Pokémon.

name: Coloree
description: Coloree is a great, relaxing, minimalistic puzzle game. If you like colors and geometric shapes, plus have the patience to move them around, this is a game for you. It’s relaxing on one hand, while still being satisfying as levels are finished and skill at Coloree increased. Simple and powerful Coloree will keep you intrigued and coming back for more.

name: Wonderful Dizzy
description:
After 26 years Dizzy finally returns with a brand new adventure for the ZX Spectrum. As with previous entries in the series the player must navigate Dizzy the egg through the perilous world while solving puzzles to progress. 
 
Wonderful Dizzy is designed by The Oliver Twins and is inspired by The Wonderful Wizard of Oz.

name: Missing Features: 2D
description: Missing Features: 2D is a platformer game that, as the name implies, the features are missing! Look how crazy! You discovered this game left on your computer and out of curiosity and free from fear of blowing up your PC, you decided to install it. The game did not install correctly (obviously) and now you need to play and install the missing features.

name: Grow Big (or Go Home)
description: Play as Bruce, the world's most talented indoor gardener, in this 2D pixel-art indoor gardening simulator. Through 15+ fast-paced levels, you will travel to different locations and eras in order to water, light, and tend to plants with the high-tech magic of a watering can and a reflective mirror.

name: Moonlit
description:
Moonlit is a living testament that simplicity is never out of style, reminiscing the good old days. In the game, you play as a mysterious girl that must deal with fearful curse, triggered by the full moon.
While keeping an old school indie format, you will be able to play through a variety of scenarios, from deserts to haunted ghost-like environment, trying to find out and fight the source of the curse.

name: Lost Keys
description: In Lost Keys, you are a boy who is lost in a place full of dangers, find the keys to open all doors and get to the exit.

name: Skid Cities
description: A Cyberpunk City Building Game. Define the city of a twisted, dark, utopian or dystopian future. Build it in the sky, underground, on the scorched remainings of what we call Earth. Enjoy the cyberpunk sandbox city simulator.

name: Skylords Reborn
description:
Skylords Reborn is the continuation of BattleForge, a Real-Time Strategy Collectible Card PC game (not a MOBA) made by EA Phenomic that got closed down at the end of October 2013. With the permission of EA to alter the existing client (until further notice is provided) the Skylords Reborn team made the game playable again.
The Skylords Team consists of former community members which are participating in this project "out of love and commitment to the game" in their spare time and is in no way related to EA.

name: Crunch Element
description: Blast through destructible compounds and slay cyborgs in virtual reality! Take cover as debris, lead, and lasers whiz past your head and prepare to return fire! Can you smash into a compound and eradicate the frenzied assailants with cutthroat efficiency?

name: Psychic Shadows
description: Unpleasant dreams await you in Psychic Shadows, an independent video game made in RPG Maker VX Ace where every decision matters.

name: Resident Evil 3: The Only One
description: Sin descripción

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Aurelia Invicta
description:
Version 4.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Dea Anchora (Durandal)
• New Story Chapter XXI: Wings of Reawakening
• New Featured Event: Stellar Mythos
• ...and more!

name: Sega Astro City Mini
description:
The Astro City Mini is a functional miniature version of the full-sized arcade cabinet that goes by the same name, and it includes 37 playable games.

The Mini features a built-in LCD screen, but if you’re interested in the bigger picture, it also includes an HDMI-out port, a headphone jack, and two USB-A ports.

name: Generation Zero: US Weapons Pack
description:
Since the fateful day of the "Cataclysm", NATO and the USSR have each been closely monitoring the situation in Sweden, raising their preparedness levels and weighing options.

When proof was obtained that there were survivors hiding in multiple locations in Östertörn, resolution "Reaction: Phase 1" was passed at NATO, as an urgent, temporary solution: large quantities of standard-issue weapons used in the American military were to be dropped all over Östertörn, in order to offer immediate assistance and support to the various groups of survivors.

name: A Night at Sea
description:
Old playstation 1 / vhs style low-poly horror/survival game designed to keep you at the edge of your seat at all times and not just a wild goose chase for keys to open doors!

A few days ago, some of the workers at the oil rig found a cave, a few miles from the rig, thinking there might be something of interest, a search team was sent to investigate, along with went the superiors, leaving only three men behind.

"A night at Sea" puts you in the shoes of those three simple oil workers, going about their daily routine, named "Freddy", "John" and "Henry", alone at the oil rig. Trying to survive, an old legend about some Mystical creatures that lurk the sea at night, Feeding of the flesh of any who confronts them.

name: Pokémon Dreams
description:
Dreams is a Pokémon Fire Red ROM hack set in a new region with a new story. The protagonist, a traveling trainer, arrives in the region of Solda. In the small community of Thicket Town, they meet a boy who seeks to live up to his brother, the local gym leader. This is their journey through the region as they meet new characters and strive for the Pokémon League.

This hack is designed with a focus on characters and worldbuilding. Though it tells a linear story, the map is sprinkled with optional areas containing useful items and Pokémon to reward exploration.

name: Clothing & Alterations
description: Set in an otherworldly tailor shop, Casey's just there for an interview for an interest blog she runs. Pretty soon she finds herself wrapped up in something she'd never asked for.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Youyoumu - Arrangements Pack
description: This new Music pack, "Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack" contains new arrangements of six popular Touhou Youyoumu songs and six challenge stages go to with each song.

name: Infinite Arrow
description: Sin descripción

name: Present Quest
description: A Visual Novel Life Simulator Mini Escape Room Christmas Adventure

name: Arkfront
description: ARKFRONT is an arcade shooter with beautiful pixel-art graphics, RPG upgrades, and a rogue-lite style progression system reminiscent of FTL. Battle your way across the galaxy in search of a new home for mankind.

name: House in the village by the river v2.0
description: immerse yourself in the small evening vicious adventures of the main characters, somewhere in the village.

name: Starmind
description: Kill it. Take its gun. Rinse and repeat. WARNING: You will die. A lot. Probably. This 2D Retro shooter is about as hard as it can get, but repetition and good luck will cut though everything like warm cheese. This game grows with the community, and more bosses will challenge you in the future.

name: Koi-Koi Japan: Hana-Awase Rule
description: Let's enjoy "Hana-Awase", another fun and exciting game played with hanafuda cards that is different from "Koi-Koi". Three players compete to create matching pairs and sets of flower cards which is where the name Hana-Awase (Flower Matching) comes from.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Land of Wano Pack
description: Get three new playable characters in Character Pack 3! Enjoy even more One Piece action with 3 characters from the Wano Country arc!

name: Immure: Part Two
description: A new door creeks open within the mysterious mansion. As the nightmare continues, Will must investigate a family tragedy. Murder, lies and sorrow fill the air. Uncover the truth and decide the fate of those who remain.

name: Spare Parts: Episode 1
description: Lucy is an anxiety-ridden girl in desperate need of a job. But when she finally lands one, she gets entangled in the interpersonal problems of the people living in the giant basement underneath the shop. Who may or may not be robots.

name: The Luminous Underground
description: Blast spirits out of a haunted subway system! Can your team defeat rival exterminators, shoddy gear, and City Hall?

name: Minesweeper Classy
description: A modern and stylish take on a classic logic puzzle game. Play the classic minesweeper levels, beat unique level layouts and challenges, or create and share your own level designs.

name: Jumping Knight
description: Jumping Knight is a platformer game with an atmospheric-dark world and a lot of challenging levels.

name: Demian: The Ritual
description: There was a forest front of a girl who awake from a dream. The girl couldn’t remember anything and she didn’t know where to go. She wandered in forest to get out of there, and she met strange family. The family's destination was a house that spirits who had a grudge lived.

name: Mahjong Solitaire 100
description: This is a simple, easy-to-understand app for the classic game of mahjong tiles that is easy to play.We've arranged the puzzles so that you can think carefully before you solve them, instead of [shuffling].We hope you will use your own thinking power to solve level 1 to 100 without relying on luck.

name: Iron Harvest: Rusviet Revolution
description: Players will follow an additional story line over the course of four new singleplayer maps, shedding some light on the mysterious Rasputin.

name: Traditional Tactics Ne+
description: You are "Prince Natri", explore the dungeon "Royal Tomb" to be the king. In there, many spirits are waiting to make a trial of your courage. Let's fight and try the simulation battle with your units!

name: Clarevoyance
description: Clarevoyance is an adventure game set in the mythic Acadian region of Clare, Nova Scotia, created directly with the community.

name: Fight of Animals: Arena
description: Meme animals strike again!! Let the meme battle goes into NEXT LEVEL!! With varied stages, items and support up to 4 players local and online, “Fight of Animals: Arena” will bring you a brand new Brawler experience!! Let the fight begin!!

name: Pon Para and the Unconquerable Scorpion
description: Reunite with old allies and find new ones to raise an army that can end the Stormraider War…and stop a mad god from destroying the World That Remains.

name: Masters of Puzzle: Christmas Edition - Frost Masters
description: A special edition puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.

name: Unscripted
description: Choose your route. Take on your developer dream in Catalina City. Make new friends and enemies. Get your game published.

name: Fortoresse
description: Fortoresse is a 2D team-based pvp warfare game in the simplest but most efficient fashion! Shoot and conjure blocks at your advantage to lead your team to victory!

name: Howdy, Jacob!
description: A dystopian find the hidden object game with full-motion video of puppets. Come spend some time with the chaotic crew of the "Laughsail!" television show, and make sure to eat your broccoli.

name: Whiskey Island
description: Drive Trucks and Trains to Transport cargo on Whiskey Island, a 3D immersive environment with a first person point of view.

name: Yum Yum Line
description: Fantastic fun for all ages. Match up the same colors to clear lines and make sure that you don't get stuck. With infinite replayability and the local battle mode, Yum Yum Line gives you the chance to play by yourself or challenge a friend on the same screen.

name: CrashMetal: Cyberpunk
description: CrashMetal: Cyberpunk The Hokuta City streets await your engine rev. Can you beat everyone in this race for first place? Upgrade your car, take care of its appearance and defeat everyone on the streets of the Hokuta City.

name: Kauil's Treasure
description:
Kauil's Treasure is a new single-player adventure-puzzle game where you, the father of a teenage girl named Sophie, need to find your daughter before the horrors behind Kauil's Treasure find her first. Thus, you'll have to solve the hardest puzzles, avoid the rotten souls corrupted by Kauil, and use your whip to get to the most dangerous places and save your daughter.

Do you have what it takes to find the most important treasure of your life?

name: Infinite Galaxy
description: Infinite Galaxy. Infinite possibilities. This is a next generation immersive, space game. With top 3D graphics and deep strategic choices to choose from, the secrets of the entire Galaxy are waiting for you to discover.

name: Family Trainer
description: Run! Swing! Jump! Family Trainer, the home exercise athletics game where you play using your whole body, is making its debut on Switch!

name: HIQ Ace Unlimited
description:
Check out the new version of the classic jigsaw puzzle game.
Train your mind, focus your eyes, improve your reflexes.
Have fun in classic Arcade mode. Take your time in the Relax mode. Check your limits in the Expert mode.

name: Glory of Rome
description: Experience the life of a city administrator as you expand the empire in the name of Rome. Build, manage and expand settlements in this resource driven city sim. You'll create resource, trade goods and take care of your citizens needs

name: Jurassic World: Aftermath
description:
Jurassic World: Aftermath is a suspenseful survival VR adventure set two years after the events of Jurassic World.

Crash-landing on Isla Nublar, you find yourself trapped in a research facility where your mission to recover valuable information goes disastrously wrong. Your only hope of escape is to retrieve the confidential information while trying to avoid three deadly Velociraptors. To survive, you’ll need to explore, solve puzzles, and find ways to distract and hide from the ferocious Velociraptors that stalk your every move.

name: Dimensions
description:
Equanox Productions Presents: Dimensions

An Action-Platformer inspired by Mega Man 2, Dimensions has the player fight crazy bosses, collect and upgrade weapons, and find secrets. Players will take control of a sprite from the 2nd Dimension universe to save the 3rd Dimension universe.

name: WitchSpring3 Re:Fine - The Story of Eirudy
description:
A lonely witch "Eirudy" who escaped from the witch hunt of an army and warriors, lives quietly in the remote deep forest.

One day, a lonely girl whose only friend is a puppet meets an adventurous young man named "Adrian" in the forest cave, setting in motion the gears of a great fate that will determine the future of the gods and humanity.

name: ZCrew
description: In ZCrew, an alien virus has turned people into raving mad zombies; wreaking havoc on the planet and leaving only ruins behind. To re-establish order, the U.N.R. summons the help of genetically modified human clones who are the only beings able to beat the odds in humanity's favor. Infected humans, mutant insects, and other monstrosities will do anything to keep Earth firmly within their grasp!

name: Nioh 2: The First Samurai
description: Nioh 2: The First Samurai is the third and final DLC expansion for Nioh 2, developed by Team Ninja and released in December 2020. The expansion continues the story of the main game, taking players back in time to uncover the origins of the protagonist, Hide, and the legendary first samurai. It introduces new areas to explore, additional story missions, new enemies, and powerful new gear. The First Samurai also expands the game's combat mechanics with new skills and abilities, providing a challenging experience for players.

name: Neptunia reVerse
description: Arrange Mode is a new mode for Go! Go! 5D Game: Neptunia reVerse, the upgraded version of Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth 1, coming to the PS5 in December 2020 in Japan.

name: Locis
description: LOCIS is a procedural horror adventure set in a dark world where anything is possible. You are an entity that for unknown reasons finds itself in this place, will you be able to survive the trials Ubel has in store for you?

name: Geometric Sniper
description: Immerse yourself in Andrew's story and feel the pressure of being a sniper. Find and eliminate the target in the crowd before he runs away.In living environments, designed exclusively for this fantastic game, you will not have a second chance, precision is everything!

name: Unforgotten
description: Unforgotten – a story-driven, non-linear visual novel, where you can immerse in the ethnic ambience of Northern myths and horrors. Can you solve the riddles of the past - without ever losing yourself in the present? Your fate is in your hands!

name: Fireworks Mania
description: FIREWORKS MANIA is an small casual explosive simulator game where you can play around with fireworks, create beautiful firework shows or maybe just blow stuff up.

name: Ryuuo no Oshigoto!
description: The Ryuo’s Work is Never Done!consists of adventure, shogi, and quiz parts. During adventure parts, players will be able to enjoy the story of the anime in addition to original scenarios.

name: Kastle Krush
description: Kastle Krush is a strategy game in a fantasy world. You can build castle and defeat your opponent. Build your castle, use unique units and spells - find the best way to win or best way to lose. Enjoy yourself in the colorful world with pigs and horses.

name: Spacerift: Arcanum System
description: At the sunset of human life on planet Earth, you are a military pilot controlling a space ship, and you find yourself at the very epicenter of the battle in the solar system. You are forced to retreat into the unknown, distant Arcanum system through hyper-jumping.

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of the game currently has 4 bonus items.

Phantasm Object, an official setting document collection
- Includes comments on character design and the heroine's expressions, comments from the cast, staff members and Ryukishi07. Also includes the Drama CD script.

Voice Drama CD, "Closed Room Desk Quiz Tournament"
- An alternate story using the same setting as the main game written by Ryukishi07 that reveals a new aspect of the heroine.

Cards of fate, 4 piece card set
- A reproduction of the Fate Cards from the game.

Acrylic art panel, "Hydrangea after the rain - Fuka"
- Visual of “Fuka” and “Ku-chan” surrounded by hydrangea shining with dew made into high quality art panels.

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison
description: A project penned by Ryukishi07 and illustrated by Inoue Itaru. The scriptwriter describes the story as "a terrifying tale of how these innocent cute girls will have everything taken from them with no mercy".

name: Suicide Guy Collection
description: Suicide Guy and Suicide Guy: Sleepin' Deeply for the first time together in a mega bundle! Set in the incredible and extraordinary dreams of its protagonist, this time you'll have to save not 1, but 2 beers.

name: Airborne Kingdom
description: Take a fantastical journey - fly the desert and build your domain. Airborne Kingdom uniquely blends city management and exploration, with a world and lore all its own. Build housing, gather food, satisfy needs, and grow your tribe. Maintain lift, discover resources, and explore the desert for lost technologies. The kingdom, your journey, their lives - all of it is up to you to decide.

name: Fantasia Re:Build
description: Fantasia Rebuild is a role-playing mobile game launched by DMM GAMES. It will bring together the characters of the Fantasia Library's many works, including "Date A Live", "Slayers", "Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girifriend" and so on. The overall world view of this work is carried out by the Koshi Tachibana, and the original character design is designed by Kurone Mishima and blkawa Kanetake. Although the official game system has not yet been released, from the propaganda words, this will be a "RPG weaved in the lost world."

name: Ancient Cities
description:
Ancient Cities is a Survival and Strategy City Builder PC game through the ages, strongly focused on history and realism. Currently being developed by Uncasual Games.

Starting in the Neolithic era, you will have to guide your people through generations, discovering and improving technologies, managing resources and population, facing threats from raiders and Mother Nature herself. And, ultimately, building the most fantastic city of antiquity through the ages in a fully simulated world and ecosystem.

name: Unsung Story
description: Unsung Story is a spiritual successor to Final Fantasy Tactics that takes place in a world where spells are cast as songs and a 77-year war has damaged the foundations of magic. Build a team to work backwards in time from the final battle to find a way to save Lasfaria.

name: Hot Couture
description: Hot Couture is the first and only book of the Hot Couture series.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
description: A game based on the TV series Who Wants to Be a Millionaire made for Mac and Apple TV.

developers.name: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Battle Kart 64
description:
Battle Kart 64 is a rom hack by Triclon for Mario Kart 64 that brings new features and options to the game’s Battle Mode. It is console compatible (note: Expansion Pak required).

New Game Modes:

- “Hot Potato” featuring a timer on whoever was hit last and counts down to zero. Whoever is the “hot potato” when the timer reaches zero loses 1 HP.

- “Squish” where you need to hit, lightning shrink, and then run over the shrunken player to score.

- “Capture The Flag” where you must capture a flag and bring it back to your base to score.

- “Keep Away” where there is one flag to fight over and each player must try to hold onto it as long as possible.

Plus new scoring options, AI bots, item toggling, the original 16 race courses playable in battle mode and much more. It is still being actively developed with new modes and options planned.

name: Tamadog
description: Have you ever dreamed about having a dog? About a cute little puppy that you will take care of… Dreams come true with dog life simulator Tamadog. Care for it, love and make it happy.

name: Spider-Man / X-Men: Arcade's Redux
description: Spider-Man / X-Men: Arcade's Redux is a massive balance patch to improve the gameplay and tone down the difficulty of the infamous original.

name: Mayhem
description: Mayhem is a horde-mode top down shooter where you and a friend must take down hordes of robots, aliens, zombies, and a giant UFO at the end.

name: Cyberway
description: Endless driving game with Synthwave music

name: Ramses: Rise of Empire - Collector's Edition
description: Ramses - Rise Of Empire Collector's Edition is a captivating Time Management game that will take you back to ancient Egypt. From your first hut to your final palace, raise the great civilization up from the sands of time! Turn small piles of coins into vast treasuries and pursue ambitious projects. Master strategic gameplay in Ramses - Rise Of Empire Collector's Edition today!

name: Down in the Dungeon
description: The first game in the 1995-american-basement-simulator genre.

name: Jetscout: Mystery of Valunians
description: Jetscout: Mystery of the Valunians is a jetpack-based platformer by Dustin Auxier where you explore diverse alien environments to solve the mystery behind the Valunians whose friends are trapped in an enormous containment facility! Play as Muun, a Jetscout initiate, as you boost, flip, and burn your way through hostile planets to fight a mind-bending cosmic evil!

name: BoatMan
description: BoatMan is a 3-person runner with a top view in which you have to control a kayak that rushes through a stormy mountain river at breakneck speed! Dodge obstacles and pick up bonuses that will help you set a record and show all your friends that you are the number one in any river expanses!

name: Sun Girls
description: Sun Girls is a small puzzle game with 8 levels about beautiful anime girls and seascapes.

name: Among Dots
description: Maze 2D Pixel Game. To survive, Sora Amber must go through the mazes, running around the labyrinths and gathering energy dots to repair the important rooms of the abandon spaceship. Find super items that boost her strength, make her invisible and help her beat the enemies. Let's go! Sora chan !!

name: Ultimate Battle
description: A game full of action and lots and lots of fun. Play numerous maps against your friends. Many modes: 1v1, 1v2, all against all.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match
description: A new game concept inspired by the classic Tower of Hanoi. Assemble towers stacking pieces of the same color on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Super Neat Cat
description: A retro style simple platforming adventure! A small cute cat must save their world from an ancient Nanobot Virus. Explore a beautiful pixel art land as you try and find the source of this destruction.

name: Relax Memory Game
description: Relax Memory Game-find a pair Game, more than 30 levels, with a choice of difficulty, a time limit that is added by guessing pairs and a limited number. The game develops your memory and attentiveness.

name: Tales of Lagoona 3: Frauds, Forgeries, and Fishsticks
description: Return to Lagoona at the bottom of the sea for a new Hidden Object adventure! Poseidon Park is in trouble once again as the latest repairs have gone horribly awry. Mayor Finn has disappeared and Leona and Theo are desperate to save the park.

name: Tropico 6: Caribbean Skies
description: The beloved leader El Presidente sets out to conquer the Caribbean Skies! The biggest DLC for Tropico 6 to date takes the fun to new altitudes with - drones.

name: Soccer Manager 2021
description:
Be a top football manager in Soccer Manager 2021. Take a football team to the top and test your management skills against the best, or help a struggling team fight for glory!

Be a top football manager in Soccer Manager 2021 - free football management game! Take a football team to the top and test your management skills and build your top eleven! Choose from over 800 clubs from 33 countries around the world.

As the football manager, you control all aspects of your club. Football coach duties include planning training sessions, developing your club’s facilities, transfers, squad selection, assigning squad numbers and deciding team tactics. Soccer Manager 2021’s level of control for your football team makes it one of the most immersive football management games!

name: InvaderSwarm
description: InvaderSwarm is an old-school hardcore game. You are the pilot of a galactic ship and it's time to destroy hundreds of aliens!

name: Hands of the Killer
description: What causes the strange sound from behind the walls at night? Can you really make money working from home? As BB investigates, she's drawn into a deeper mystery. What are the hands of the killer, and how far do they reach..?

name: Something Strange in the Woods
description: Something Strange is happening in the Woods, different creatures appear endlessly, which upsets the balance. Can you maintain balance by freeing the forest from these creatures?

name: VikingStory
description: VikingStory-Hurricane 2d platformer, where you play as a Viking conqueror, who uses a sword and bow to deal with monsters, buy upgrades for broken gold, climb walls and deftly Dodge dangerous plants that disguise themselves as flowers, danger lurks around!

name: Archeologist Simulator
description: Like a true explorer, look for all the bones hidden underground to build the dinosaur skeleton.

name: Synthetik: Ultimate
description: Fight against relentless opponents and unforgiving bosses encased in ever-changing environments. Master the uniquely deep and satisfying weapon mechanics and the unprecedented amount of customization. Discover a seemingly unending amount of weapons, items, perks and character upgrades.

name: Return of the Heir
description: After a long war, you come back to your hometown. As a noble, you commanded a detachment of the army led by the king. As you approach your castle, you notice that something is wrong. As you get closer, you will notice that the castle has been occupied by orcs. Your two companions are killed before your eyes by the enemy orc on the castle walls. In a hurry, you go to the back of the castle, where you activate a secret passage known only to family members. You decide, as the heir of the head of the family, to take the castle from the hands of the wicked orcs. Return of the Heir is an adventure-platform game set in a fantasy world. As a young heir, we travel through the nooks and crannies of our family castle in search of missing family members. Additionally, we are trying to recover the treasures stolen by the invaders. On our way there are hosts of orcs, sinister rats, spiders and various traps such as hidden spikes, falling orbs, gargoyles spitting fire or lava holes. Armed only with a bow, you must do whatever it takes to recapture the castle you will wield in the future.

name: Defentron
description: Get ready and battle for the ultimate upgrade. Defentron, the retro-futurist computer system is trying to safeguard itself from malicious viruses that seek to control its core. Use strategy to upgrade your lines of defense and become the most powerful security system ever known. Think like an 80s software. You will face fast, hard, resilient enemies, capable of regenerating or splitting when destroyed, returning to the battlefield. Nobody will be safe until the last of the living enemies falls. Will you be able to save Defentron from the enemy threat? It all depends on you.

name: Abyss of the Sacrifice
description:
Set after the demise of a city deep underground, Misshitsu no Sacrifice tells the story of five young girls to attempt to escape and the friendships, enmity, and horror they experience along the way.

Players must solve a variety of puzzles to find out what the future holds for the young girls in this atmospheric tale of family, friendship, and betrayal that unfolds behind closed doors.

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds: Season 10
description: Hide, Seek, Survive

name: My Heroes: SEA
description: My Heroes is a classic pixel-style barrage shooting ARPG game that players can freely team up for adventure. The game is centered on the pursuit of refreshing and exciting barrage shooting battles, with a high degree of freedom and strategic Diablo-style building and development gameplay, creating an interesting pixel adventure world for players.

name: Royale Archer VR
description: Use your bow to defeat the enemy and challenge the harder stage with summoning allies, setting traps, and using magic!

name: Speed Stars
description: Simple but challenging rhythm-based running game. Compete to achieve the highest rank, unlock more characters, set personal bests, and climb the leaderboards.

name: Mercenaries Blaze: Dawn of the Twin Dragons
description: Experience a lengthy and challenging story campaign, an enthralling tale full of emotive writing, plot twists and high stakes moments. Grow with your team by clearing strategic turn-based battles, with many optional missions and details to consider – which class will you upgrade for each character, and what equipment or skills will you prioritise?

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season One
description: Season 1 is the first batch of post-launch content for Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War. Revenge, Revolt, and Revelations rock the world of Black Ops Cold War and Warzone. Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season 1 offers a massive expansion of free content including eight free maps, three free-to-acquire weapons, an innovative and rewarding Battle Pass system, and much more. Plus: drop into the new Rebirth Island Warzone map!

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 7
description: Franchise Hockey Manager is OOTP Developments' NHL licensed hockey management game for the 2020-21 season.

name: Colossus Down
description: Colossus Down is a beat'em up`with a mixture of brute force delivery with lots of fantastic environments that lead the player to plenty of hilarious situations through a narrative driven adventure. Strategic destruction, puzzle solving, decision making and a spicy plot come together in this one of a kind action game.

name: MXGP 2020: The Official Motocross Videogame
description: Saddle up and challenge the 68 riders of the MXGP and MX2 categories, on the 19 circuits of the 2020 season, and have fun with the new features.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Ultimate Edition
description:
The iconic Black Ops series is back with Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - the direct sequel to the original and fan-favorite Call of Duty: Black Ops. Black Ops Cold War will drop fans into the depths of the Cold War’s volatile geopolitical battle of the early 1980s. Nothing is ever as it seems in a gripping single-player Campaign, where players will come face-to-face with historical figures and hard truths, as they battle around the globe through iconic locales like East Berlin, Vietnam, Turkey, Soviet KGB headquarters and more.

Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Ultimate Edition includes:
- Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S version of Black Ops Cold War
- Land, Sea and Air Pack
- Battle Pass Bundle
- Confrontation Weapons Pack
- Legendary Captain Price Operator Skin

name: Jetscout: Mystery of the Valunians
description: Jetscout: Mystery of the Valunians is a jetpack-based platformer by Dustin Auxier where you maneuver your way through alien worlds to solve the strange mystery behind the Valunians and their friends who are trapped an enormous containment facility. Play as Muun, a Jetscout initiate as you dash, flip, and burn your way through hostile environments to fight a mind-bending cosmic evil!

name: The Chess Variants Club
description: Play and discover 12 popular chess variants, improve your chess skills with hundreds of chess puzzles, or simply play regular chess with your friends - all in one package. This diverse collection includes several chess games and puzzles. All in a minimalist, beautifully designed virtual chess club.

name: Powder VR
description: An extreme winter sports VR simulation game. Pick your line and method: Ski, snowboard, or wingsuit through ice and snow at crushing velocity. Race the clock and dominate the terrain with speed, precision, and skill- master the mountain from 14,000 ft.

name: Body of Evidence
description: In Body of Evidence you will become a professional cleaner! You will need to hide the body and clean all the mess before the uninvited guest arrives. Use your imagination and cleverness to convince curious guest that everything is okay.

name: Pikmin 3: Special Holiday Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: 100 Doors Mystery Adventures
description: Get ready to escape all possible places dedicated to different rooms and location, solve enigma and open the door. Uncover the new mystery of an adventure. 100 doors escape journey is the sequel of point and click nature with more riddling puzzles. Try to break all the doors and mysterious locks. Prove yourself and solve the baffle to exit the room.

name: The Night Driver
description: The Night Driver is a point and click, RPG, adult game. Set in a dark and dirty world, full of drug dealers, prostitutes, criminals, and liars.

name: Super Metroid: GBA Edition
description: GBA Edition is a romhack that ports in the map of Super Metroid into Zero Mission engine.

name: Hatsune Miku Amiguru Train
description:
This time around, Amigurus will be riding around the track in a cute cart!

Aim for the goal by simply dragging left and right!
If you collect a ball of yarn, you'll connect to more Amigurus!
Be careful of the numbered walls, because you'll lose Amigurus if you bump into them! There are all sorts of items and gimmicks in the course!
There's also an endless mode so you can play over and over again to aim for a high score!

The Amigurus features Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, MEIKO and KAITO in various costumes! Rabbit Yukine might even make an appearance!

name: Eternal Kingdom Battle Peak
description: A "Japanese" MMORPG featuring renowned creators such as Yoshitaka Amano! Travel with your allies through vast fields where weather changes and dungeons where your role is crucial!! PVP is also possible on the field! Establish a legion and join a "Siege" where up to 200 players battle!!

name: An Ode to Todd the Toad: Frogcare!
description:
Be a frog mom! Play with your frogs in the nest mode. Name them, give them outfits, and let them play with the toys they found!

Protect your frogs in The Maze! With 1 or 2 players on keyboard, or a bunch of players on gamepad, smack away the wasps while your frogs eat flies. Don't let the wasps get to them!

name: Spellbreak: Chapter 1 - The Spellstorm
description:
“We have to stop it. But in order to do that…we need you.”
Welcome to Chapter 1: The Spellstorm!

name: Sakura Kakumei: Hana Saku Otome-tachi
description:
Sakura Kakumei is set in an alternate version of Tokyo, in the year Taisho 100 (2011 CE). In the year Taisho 84 (1995 CE), disaster struck the capital in a calamity known as the Great Imperial Capital Disaster. The nation was able to rebuild and recover, thanks to the discovery of a new energy based on spiritual power, known only as Mirai.

Sadly, with the activation of the New Imperial Tower, the cherry blossoms stopped blooming. Moreover, demons known as “Koki” began to increase in number, lashing out to attack people across the nation. To protect the people, the government formed the Great Imperial Combat Revue B.L.A.C.K., who protect the people from evil while bringing light to their hearts with unmatched live performances.

While peace reigns among the people thanks to Mirai and B.L.A.C.K. and many have put their trust in the government, some have come to realize that it is but a false prosperity.

These brave souls are known as the Imperial Combat Revue, and their mission is to uncover the government’s conspiracy and retake Japan!

name: Retro Basketball Coach 2021
description: Trade players, manage your lineup, and coach your team to a championship title! Retro Basketball Coach 2021 puts you in charge of your favourite city as you try and take your team to the play offs and a shot at winning the finals.

name: Running With Rifles: Edelweiss
description: head to the European of World War II, first parachuting into Sicily before moving on to the invasion of Normandy, Belgium, and more...

name: Kris Kringle's Christmas Village VR
description: Get into the spirit of Christmas with this festive holiday VR experience. Play wintery carnival activities- Holi-Darts, Ski-Ball, Reindeer Basketball and the Blizzard Blaster Gallery!

name: Christmas Stories: The Christmas Tree Forest - Collector's Edition
description: Only you can save Christmas!

name: 3x3 the Adventure Game
description: 3x3 is an interactive adventure game in 2d cartoon style mixed with narrative and movie sequences. The gameplay dynamic is close from an escape game. An episodic format of nine chapters is planned for the first part of the story call prologue connected with mini TV series from 3x3 whole universe
